programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Wildlife Nannies: Animal Shelter; Babies
programme.desc: Clint and Irene Davy turned their home into a animals shelter when they first arrived on the Gibsons coast.

programme.title: Poppys Promise - Secret Life in a Cornfield
programme.desc: The cornfield - just an area for producing food… or a land full of secrets? This doc portrays a little recognized habitat right next door. The spectacular visuals filmed with state of the art equipment introduce the surprisingly large diversity of field inhabitants. We follow a hamster family through a season full of adventures and are drawn into an unknown world – a world of which we thought we knew everything about. In the western industrial nations cornfields and woods take up the greatest proportion of rural land. But how much natural life dwells in a cornfield? Why are some cornfield inhabitants harmful and others useful and what do the colourful flowers at the edge of the field...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret World of Herbs - In Provence
programme.desc: Its native fragrant flowers and aromatic herbs have made the Provence a brand known worldwide. The wealth of flora found in this region, between the French Alps and the Mediterranean, is unequalled among the French provinces. Around Sault, near Mont Ventoux, the valleys and high plains are carpeted with bright violet: In the hot climate of the South of France, lavender blooms and exudes its fragrance. Monastic healers have been using its aromatic medicinal oil since the Middle Ages. And today an entire industry is based on the trade with this fragrant flower. Yet the livelihood of Provençal lavender farmers is imperiled. In France’s major lavender-growing region, the “Plateau de...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret World of Herbs - In India
programme.desc: In India, herbs play an everyday role hardly equalled anywhere in the world. From the tropical green south to the mountains of the northern Himalayas, herbs lend fragrance to joss sticks and soaps, and flavor to the cuisine. And, above all, herbs heal. Six thousand varieties of plants are used in India, and most are harvested in the wild – where they are becoming depleted. The ever rising need for herbal medicine for the subcontinent’s 1.3 billion inhabitants comes on top of the demand of its growing middle class for herbal-based cosmetics. As a result, certain herbs have become scarce, while others have already vanished entirely. Most of the herbs in India are harvested in the wild. The...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret World of Herbs - In Latin America
programme.desc: Healing effects, fragrance, and intense flavor – the benefits of herbs were discovered by the indigenous peoples of South America long before Spanish conquistadores subdued the continent. Even today, in the remote regions of South America, life without herbs is unthinkable. For many inhabitants, they provide the sole medicine. For more than two thousand years, this wisdom of the healing powers of nature has been passed down from generation to generation. In Bolivia, the film accompanies ethnobiologist Rainer Bussmann on one of his expeditions documenting which herbs the locals use against which illnesses. The German scientist has spent the last 15 years in the region, focussed on...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Secret World of Herbs - In the Alps
programme.desc: Secluded for many centuries in inaccessible valleys, the inhabitants of the Alps had no alternative but to rely on the healing powers of nature. A knowledge of herbs was deeply rooted in these mountain-dwellers’ everyday lives – until the twentieth century, when this wisdom became eclipsed by modern academic medicine. Today, Alpine herbs are witnessing a revival, as public interest in regional natural treasures grows. The potential of Alpine herbs is far from exhausted. In the Berchtesgaden Alps, the film shows Hubsi Ilsanker at work as a root-digger, a back-breaking job that has scarcely changed in four hundred years. Authorized by a special historic permit to supply the oldest gentian...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Secret world of Herbs - In the Balkans
programme.desc: In the pristine nature and mild climate of southeastern Europe grows a unique diversity of wild plants. Far removed from major industry and polluted soils, the Balkan countries have become the largest exporter of herbs in Europe. In Bulgaria alone, more than 300,000 people work with domestic plants. The business is becoming increasingly lucrative. The film takes us to the Croatian coast. On the Adriatic island of Cres, the audience meets Mladen Dragoslavić. In May, when the sage begins to blossom, this beekeeper has one month to produce his income for an entire year – always with the goal of creating the best sage honey in the Balkans. Given a choice, the bees would never choose sage, for...

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers - An American Journey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Through Utahs Canyons to Salt Lake City
programme.desc: It’s a dream route leading from the casino metropolis of Las Vegas, to Salt Lake City, the Mormon capital. It is a journey that follows the footsteps of the first settlers: the Mormons. They came to this desert belt of the United States during the second half of the 19th century to escape persecution and in search of the promised land. Some of them founded Las Vegas. Others moved through the canyons and over the mountains of the colossal Colorado Plateau, where they found water and pasture, to establish many small settlements. The landscapes through which they trekked, had and still have, a breathtaking and bizarre majestic beauty. Bryce Canyon, the hogbacks and the Escalante Staircase...

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers - An American Journey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Through Louisiana Along the Mississippi
programme.desc: The vast Delta of the Mississippi River is the gateway to the South of the United States. It always has been. This is where our journey begins: through Louisiana along the banks of the mighty river, to the big inland city of New Orleans, founded long ago by the French. Further inland, sugarcane plantations and the villas of their former owners stretch as far as the eye can see. To the north, we leave the river and, taking spectacular roads, we pass through the swamplands of the Mississippi, which were once impenetrable, serving as the ideal hideout for many a runaway. Bordering Texas, where the swamplands end, is the beginning of the vast cattle country. This is home to the last remaining...

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers - An American Journey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Along the Shores of the Great Lakes
programme.desc: The Great Lakes are among the most mythical landscapes of North America: endless water, endless forest. Many Native American peoples lived there; later European settlers followed on the heels of the white hunters and trappers. They hunted in the forests and transported their furs and other goods across the water to the south where a small river situated at the southern tip of Lake Michigan flows onward towards the southern states. The settlement that sprung up there was called Checagou by the Indians. Much later, the settlement was to be the first skyscraper city in the world: Chicago, the megacity on the Great Lake.

programme.title: Secrets of the Mediterranean
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Secrets of the Mediterranean, Ep.1
programme.desc: The contours of the Mediterranean have changed during the course of its history. Near Gibraltar, Africa was once connected to the European continent. When the land bridge at Gibraltar collapsed, the Mediterranean basin filled up again. The Suez Canal is today connected to the Red Sea. This route enables animals to reach the Mediterranean, where they cause problems.

programme.title: Secrets of the Mediterranean
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Secrets of the Mediterranean, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Rugged rocks, blue sea and idyllic, sandy beaches - this is the Mediterranean as we know it. But this impression is deceptive: the Mediterranean is under constant change. The continents are moving towards one another. Animals, that have to survive under such extreme conditions, must find a way to escape the dangers. Between deserts and volcanoes, the challenges for the animals are enormous.

programme.title: Germanys Wild Amazon
programme.desc: As one of Germany’s beauties, the river was the gem of Germanys landscape. But with industrialization it became the country’s hardest working river and like everything that has been overworked, it lost it magnificence and charm. Due to tender love and care, the river is now a reigning example of one of the most successful and outstanding renaturation projects in the country.The film shows never before seen shots of the river now pulsing with life. We will show you the winding river bed, spawning salmon, mating crabs and still-growing anchor ice. You will see dipper birds searching for food under water, kingfishers catching fish, a family life of badgers, foxes and a wide variety of birds....

programme.title: Germanys Wild Reservoirs
programme.desc: One of the smallest dams in the Bergisches Land is the Panzertalsperre, with an area of just four-and-a-half football pitches. On the other hand, the Dhunntalsperre is the largest with the area of 660 football pitches. They all transform a stretch of flowing water into still and stagnant water. As a result, completely diverse ecosystems have developed there: where the dipper once dived for insect larvae, cormorants and gray herons now fish and swans and coots cavort. In recent summers, even greater challenges have emerged: the effects of climate change - from extreme drought to destructive floods. On a smaller scale, a rather industrious dam master is operating flood protection: The...

programme.title: Germanys Mystic Forest
programme.desc: 2.000 rivers and streams dig deep into the underground and transport their water into reservoirs or "Germanys Wild Amazon", the Wupper. These forests and rivers, together with heathlands and moors, are home to a diverse fauna. Martens, badgers, wild boars, hares, roe deer, and red deer, even black grouse and hazel deer find shelter in these parts. Wolves also have a dominant presence, not to mention those who live underground, such as lizards, bats, and snakes. Accompany us on a journey where we explore every corner of this rugged land. Climb underground into the Bergisches Land, through the vast hidden cave systems that sprawl far beneath the forests. There is also much to be discovered...

programme.title: Northern Woods
programme.desc: It is a musical film a a tributeto the Nordic forest: it shows its development from a primeval wood to a cultivated forest. Once populated by wild animals such as wolves, bears, eagles, deer and musk oxen, complex re-enactment-scenes shot by dollies and helicopters vividly depict the colonization of the forest by the Celts and Germans. But as time progressed, the northern forest has on numerous occasions fallen victim to environmental degradation and overexploitation. Several provisions were made to protect this wild beauty. The Helsinki resolution of 1993, which stipulated that the woods be used in a way and in a magnitude which guarantees their biological variety and productiveness and...

programme.title: Poppys Promise - Secret Life in a Cornfield
programme.desc: The cornfield - just an area for producing food… or a land full of secrets? This doc portrays a little recognized habitat right next door. The spectacular visuals filmed with state of the art equipment introduce the surprisingly large diversity of field inhabitants. We follow a hamster family through a season full of adventures and are drawn into an unknown world – a world of which we thought we knew everything about. In the western industrial nations cornfields and woods take up the greatest proportion of rural land. But how much natural life dwells in a cornfield? Why are some cornfield inhabitants harmful and others useful and what do the colourful flowers at the edge of the field...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret World of Herbs - In Provence
programme.desc: Its native fragrant flowers and aromatic herbs have made the Provence a brand known worldwide. The wealth of flora found in this region, between the French Alps and the Mediterranean, is unequalled among the French provinces. Around Sault, near Mont Ventoux, the valleys and high plains are carpeted with bright violet: In the hot climate of the South of France, lavender blooms and exudes its fragrance. Monastic healers have been using its aromatic medicinal oil since the Middle Ages. And today an entire industry is based on the trade with this fragrant flower. Yet the livelihood of Provençal lavender farmers is imperiled. In France’s major lavender-growing region, the “Plateau de...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret World of Herbs - In India
programme.desc: In India, herbs play an everyday role hardly equalled anywhere in the world. From the tropical green south to the mountains of the northern Himalayas, herbs lend fragrance to joss sticks and soaps, and flavor to the cuisine. And, above all, herbs heal. Six thousand varieties of plants are used in India, and most are harvested in the wild – where they are becoming depleted. The ever rising need for herbal medicine for the subcontinent’s 1.3 billion inhabitants comes on top of the demand of its growing middle class for herbal-based cosmetics. As a result, certain herbs have become scarce, while others have already vanished entirely. Most of the herbs in India are harvested in the wild. The...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret World of Herbs - In Latin America
programme.desc: Healing effects, fragrance, and intense flavor – the benefits of herbs were discovered by the indigenous peoples of South America long before Spanish conquistadores subdued the continent. Even today, in the remote regions of South America, life without herbs is unthinkable. For many inhabitants, they provide the sole medicine. For more than two thousand years, this wisdom of the healing powers of nature has been passed down from generation to generation. In Bolivia, the film accompanies ethnobiologist Rainer Bussmann on one of his expeditions documenting which herbs the locals use against which illnesses. The German scientist has spent the last 15 years in the region, focussed on...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Secret World of Herbs - In the Alps
programme.desc: Secluded for many centuries in inaccessible valleys, the inhabitants of the Alps had no alternative but to rely on the healing powers of nature. A knowledge of herbs was deeply rooted in these mountain-dwellers’ everyday lives – until the twentieth century, when this wisdom became eclipsed by modern academic medicine. Today, Alpine herbs are witnessing a revival, as public interest in regional natural treasures grows. The potential of Alpine herbs is far from exhausted. In the Berchtesgaden Alps, the film shows Hubsi Ilsanker at work as a root-digger, a back-breaking job that has scarcely changed in four hundred years. Authorized by a special historic permit to supply the oldest gentian...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Secret world of Herbs - In the Balkans
programme.desc: In the pristine nature and mild climate of southeastern Europe grows a unique diversity of wild plants. Far removed from major industry and polluted soils, the Balkan countries have become the largest exporter of herbs in Europe. In Bulgaria alone, more than 300,000 people work with domestic plants. The business is becoming increasingly lucrative. The film takes us to the Croatian coast. On the Adriatic island of Cres, the audience meets Mladen Dragoslavić. In May, when the sage begins to blossom, this beekeeper has one month to produce his income for an entire year – always with the goal of creating the best sage honey in the Balkans. Given a choice, the bees would never choose sage, for...

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers - An American Journey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Through Utahs Canyons to Salt Lake City
programme.desc: It’s a dream route leading from the casino metropolis of Las Vegas, to Salt Lake City, the Mormon capital. It is a journey that follows the footsteps of the first settlers: the Mormons. They came to this desert belt of the United States during the second half of the 19th century to escape persecution and in search of the promised land. Some of them founded Las Vegas. Others moved through the canyons and over the mountains of the colossal Colorado Plateau, where they found water and pasture, to establish many small settlements. The landscapes through which they trekked, had and still have, a breathtaking and bizarre majestic beauty. Bryce Canyon, the hogbacks and the Escalante Staircase...

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers - An American Journey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Through Louisiana Along the Mississippi
programme.desc: The vast Delta of the Mississippi River is the gateway to the South of the United States. It always has been. Bordering Texas, where the swamplands end, is the beginning of the vast cattle country. This is home to the last remaining...

programme.title: Europe`s Forgotten Pilgrim Routes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Europe`s Forgotten Pilgrim Routes: Switzerland, Italy: The VIA FRANCIGENA to Rome
programme.desc: For centuries, pilgrims have set off on the Via Francigena in the hopes of reaching the tombs of the apostles Peter and Paul in Rome. The ancient pilgrimage route leads through the imposing Alps to the Great St Bernard Pass and from there cross-country through Italy.

programme.title: mareTV: Wismar Bay - World Heritage and Water Paradise
programme.desc: The Wismar Bay is unique in its diversity on the Mecklenburg Baltic Sea coast: cliffs, sandy beaches, salt marshes, enchanted islands and, last but not least, the proud Hanseatic city of Wismar with its brick Gothic buildings, which are a UNESCO World Heritage Site. When the mighty logs get wedged together in the timber mill in the port of Wismar, Steven Buchholz has to get to work with his chainsaw. Its a dangerous job, because the logs weigh tons. As a trained carpenter, Steven is a virtuoso with the chain saw. Even after his shift is over, he is looking for the thrill: the wind off his home island of Poel is favorable that day and he wants to reclaim the German record in the kite...

programme.title: mareTV: The Eckernforde Bay - Beach shooters, mine clearance divers, squirrels
programme.desc: Fjord, ford, bay, gulf: there are many names for the beautiful extensions of the Baltic Sea into the country. Eckernforde Bay is shaped by currents, surf and people. It stretches 17 kilometers to the town that gives it its name. Stephan Moller is the acting shooting master of the Eckernforder Burgerschutzengilde. He spent a whole year preparing the beach shooting festival and then this: fog, rain and a stiff breeze. Traditionally, the Eckernforde marksmen always shoot at a wooden bird in the direction of the sea at Whitsun. Under strict conditions! And these stipulate a clear view of at least one kilometer out into the bay. The event literally threatens to fall through, for the first time...

programme.title: One Year in Norways Lofoten
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One Year in Norways Lofoten: Episode 1
programme.desc: Winter means more than just the beginning of the year for the people of Lofoten: For more than a thousand years, Lofoten has been a hub for cod fishing, with seasons lasting from February to April as huge shoals migrate from the Barents Sea to these waters. During these hectic months, more than 65,000 tons of fish are brought to shore, securing the income for the whole of Lofoten for years to come. Around a quarter of the fish caught ends up on lines to dry upon racks. From a young age, the children from the fishing villages get to earn some pocket money by cutting cod tongues and selling the produce as a delicacy appreciated by the locals.

programme.title: One Year in Norways Lofoten
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 One Year in Norways Lofoten: Episode 2
programme.desc: Almost unnoticeably, spring turns into summer. The days become longer and longer, with a never-setting sun. People who have spent their winter and spring working hard can finally enjoy their own nature, even though the temperature is only slightly warmer. Lofoten is sparsely populated, just 24,000 people live here. Unstad is one of its smallest communities with only 15 inhabitants, but despite that, it has become a hotspot for arctic surf and is host to the northern-most surf center in the world. Surfers from all over the globe come to surf in the arctic water.

programme.title: mareTV: The white wilderness in Greenlands East
programme.desc: Fjords, glaciers and the highest mountains in the Arctic: East Greenland with its spectacular nature is one of the most sparsely populated regions on earth. The people here live in extreme isolation and depend on helicopter flights for their supplies. Despite harsh conditions, the inhabitants here lovingly maintain their traditions and enjoy their outdoor leisure time even at minus 20 degrees Celsius. The town of Tasiilaq is the "metropolis" with 4,000 inhabitants and offers a very special attraction: the only ski lift on the east coast. Thomas Mikaelsen, the lift attendant, is not to be envied for his job. The only 100 meter long lift comes from Switzerland and is already 20 years old....

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: The Sulcis Archipelago is located off the south-western coast of Sardinia and is part of the province of of southern Sardinia. The islands of San Pietro, SantAntioco and Isola Piana form the archipelago, together with several uninhabited islets and rocks form the archipelago. It belongs to the less known areas in Italy and is little developed for tourism. Nevertheless stars like Tom Cruise and Roberto Cavalli come here to enjoy the peace, seclusion and good food. The islanders are only moderately interested in these visitors, and their down-to-earth attitude has never lost.

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: Lake Iseo is located on the southern foothills of the Alps. It extends over the provinces of Brescia and Bergamo in the northern mainland of Italy. In the middle of Lake Iseo lies the largest island of the southern European inland waters. Monte Isola, as the island is called after its central mountain lies close to its two neighboring islands, Isola di San Paolo and Isola di Loreto. As early as the 11th century, a monastic association of Benedictines settled here. For many Italians, Lake Iseo is the most beautiful spot in their homeland. It is all the more astonishing how little the influence of tourism is here. Driving is strictly forbidden on the three islands, and only on Monte Isola....

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: The Tuscan Archipelago is a group of islands at the height of Florence. The archipelago stretches from the Ligurian Sea to the Tyrrhenian Sea, north-east of Corsica. The archipelago consists of seven main islands - Giglio, Elba, Gianutri, Capraia, Pianisoa, Gorgona and Montecristo - and other smaller islands and rocks. Not all of them are inhabited. We look at the three most extraordinary islands of the archipelago: Elba, Capraia and the island of Montecristo. The Tuscan Archipelago is one of the most important natural wonders of the world and is protected as Parco Nazionale dellArcipelago Toscano. With its 61.474 hectares of protected and 17,694 hectares of protected land area, it is...

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: Far from the glamour and spotlight of Lampedusa, Pantelleria is one of the best kept secrets among the Italian islands. Located closer to Tunisia than to the Italian mainland, Pantelleria closer to Tunisia than to the Italian mainland, Pantelleria has been nicknamed "The Last Island," a title also given by Giosuè Calaciura gave to his 2016 historical novel set on Pantelleria. Pantelleria, that is the island of lava, capers and of the liqueur wine that comes here Zibibbo. An island with an ancient history, where for centuries farmers and fishermen have pursued their craft. their craft. The famous Zibibbo grapes are cultivated here - among other things also on the vineyard that Gerard...

programme.title: The marvellous World of French Rivers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Marvellous french Rivers - Girone
programme.desc: The Gironde is the largest and most powerful tidal current in Europe. When the Gironde flows into the Atlantic, it is 15 kilometers wide and in the rhythm of the tides, it brings the waters from the Pyrenees and the Massif Central into the ocean. This often pushes its waters far out into the Gironde at high tide.This creates a world of its own that has shaped everything uniquely and intensely for tens of thousands of years. The water surface of the river is so large that the evaporation has created its own microclimate, which is stable and, together with the brackish waters, has influenced flora and fauna on the right and left of the bank for a long time.

programme.title: The marvellous World of French Rivers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Marvellous french Rivers - Dordogne
programme.desc: The Dordogne consists of a visible and an invisible system of flowing water. Caves and basins under the earths surface store the excess water and return it to the river when it is dry. A perfect management of a precious resource, not invented by humans, but by the complex nature itself. The result is an ever life-giving river.

programme.title: The Provence coast - Marseille and the Côte Bleue
programme.desc: The Provence is famed for its endless fields of laven-der, but this lush landscape also has a beautifully mari-time touch: The Côte Bleue! Small, hidden beaches, charming harbour towns, imposing, craggy bays and a uniquely clear light that has attracted painters includ-ing Cezanne and Braque. The coast derives its name from the deep blue water and extends from Marseille to Martigues. This small town is also known as "The Ven-ice of the North", as it is shaped entirely by water: an inland lake, the sea itself, as well as a connecting canal. In the bays of the Calanques, the steeply-walled coastal inlets in the Mediterranean limestone, Lionel Franc is a cliff diver. His personal record is a...

programme.title: Europe`s Forgotten Pilgrim Routes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Europe`s Forgotten Pilgrim Routes: England: The Pilgrims Way to Canterbury
programme.desc: In the Middle Ages, the horrifying murder of Archbishop Thomas Becket of Canterbury led thousands of pilgrims to the south of England. Centuries later, the long-forgotten Pilgrims Way is now enjoying a revival. The Pilgrims Way leads east to west cross-country from Winchester to Canterbury through the counties of Hampshire, Surrey and Kent.

programme.title: Europe`s Forgotten Pilgrim Routes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Europe`s Forgotten Pilgrim Routes: France: The Mont-Saint-Michel Way
programme.desc: In honour of the Archangel Michael, thousands of medieval Christians set off on pilgrimages to the famous mountain monastery of the Mont-Saint-Michel in the Atlantic Ocean. Today it continues to enchant millions of visitors each year. But the pilgrimage route from Rouen to the mountain abbey seems to have been forgotten: it leads through the depths of Normandy into rural France.

programme.title: Europe`s Forgotten Pilgrim Routes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Europe`s Forgotten Pilgrim Routes: Switzerland, Italy: The VIA FRANCIGENA to Rome
programme.desc: For centuries, pilgrims have set off on the Via Francigena in the hopes of reaching the tombs of the apostles Peter and Paul in Rome. The ancient pilgrimage route leads through the imposing Alps to the Great St Bernard Pass and from there cross-country through Italy.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: Madeira - Portugals autonomous island in the Atlantic Ocean, is closer to the African coast than to the mother country Portugal, from which it is separated by about 900 kilometers. The islands name comes from Portuguese sailors who claimed the uninhabited isle for themselves in 1419. Madeira means wood and that was available in abundance. Almost the entire surface was covered by dense forest. Since 1982, two-thirds of the landscape has been protected.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: The "Parque Natural da Ria Formosa" is one of the largest lagoon conservation areas in Europe. Bordered by five natural islands. A mosaic of sandbanks, brackish and freshwater lagoons and salt marshes. In 2010, the "Ria Formosa" was chosen as one of the seven natural wonders of Portugal. It is a unique ecosystem: in the winter months, more than 20,000 birds gather here. In addition, the nature park has one of the largest seahorse populations internationally. More than half of all fish species in the Atlantic are said to spawn in the lagoon.

programme.title: I Got a Monster: Americas Most Corrupt Police Squad
programme.desc: Retells in highly dramatic fashion one of the USAs biggest police corruption scandals. programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . programme.desc: A suspect races through the neighborhood after his scooter can’t outrun police. Cops discover a drugged, incoherent wild man lying in the bushes. Officers try to make peace between neighbors with pit bull problems.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect bites an Officer while trying to avoid arrest. An Officer responds to a stabbing. An Officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing 4-year-old.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: At the conclusion of an extensive pursuit, the driver eventually loses control and runs into a stop sign. Officers stop a stolen vehicle leaving a known drug house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A normal traffic stop turns into an off-road race through a residential neighborhood. Police find a runaway suspect taking refuge in a family member’s closet. A domestic dispute erupts over chips and dip.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer wrestles a squirrely meth user who thinks he’s the Incredible Hulk. Cops catch a drug-carrying sprinter when he runs out of gas. A belligerent suspect doesn’t take kindly to having his socks removed.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers investigate an apparent stabbing. Officers respond to a call about a suspicious man loitering in a private park. A driver insists his vehicle is not stolen even though the plates are.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A truck driver decides to hide from police in the last place they’ll look: his own house. A man out on a beer run is robbed at knifepoint. In Portland a man decides to go nude for a bike ride.

programme.sub-title: S14 : E02 Pain in the Neck
programme.desc: Deputies confront a man holding a knife to his roommate’s neck over a prior argument. A suspect runs from Deputies on a warrant charge. Suspected robbers are pulled over by Deputies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An out-of-control woman needs to be subdued after an arrest. Deputies spot an erratic driver who appears to be under the influence. A car is seen driving backwards on a one-way street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A K-9 unit finds the suspect hiding in a shed. A cooperative suspect is faced with a list of charges. A motorcycle chase comes to an end after the suspect ditches the stolen bike and flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A remorseful woman is arrested for lewd conduct during Mardi Gras. Officers are dispatched into the busy streets of New Orleans during the super bowl. Officers investigates a theft at a local store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E29 The Last Home Invasion
programme.desc: Police investigate an attempted robbery that turned deadly. Officers enlist a K9 unit to flush out a suspect. A high-speed chase comes to an end when the suspect crashes into a fence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Despite driving a large SUV and trailer, a suspect tries to outrun the police. A driver tries to hide contraband on his person. Police are called into a domestic dispute involving a husband and wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Detectives chase a suspect who wrecks his car. Police are called when a man headbutts his neighbor. Officers tend to a woman punched in the face by her husband while on the bus.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A transgender woman in a wheelchair opens a can of whoop ass on an aggressive bully. Officers find a barely dressed couple in the midst of a biting match. A reckless driver doesn’t take too kindly to being pulled over.

programme.sub-title: S27 : E30 The One Dollar Shoe
programme.desc: A well-known local nuisance gets caught bothering people once again. Officers get a kick out of a usual suspect with money in his shoe. Cops try to make sense of a man who’s barely coherent and barely dressed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drug dealer swallows something suspicious as deputies move in to arrest him. Deputies pull over a father with his son in the car. A woman files a kidnapping report against her own boyfriend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies detain a man when a gun falls from his pantleg. Deputies are called when a father spits on his son’s girlfriend. Officers respond when a child is bitten by two large dogs.

programme.title: Cops

programme.desc: Two suspects wreck their vehicle while attempting to evade police in a hot pursuit. Officers respond to a domestic dispute involving neighbors. A suspect abandons his truck and shoes while running from Officers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A bicyclist ends up on the pavement when he tries to out pedal a patrol car. A messy divorce leads to a gun-toting showdown between a Corvette and a Mustang. An angry dog ends up getting the best of a domestic dispute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A K-9 unit assists on a motorcycle pursuit turned foot chase gone awry. Officers investigate after noticing the garage door to an auto body shop is open. A pursuit involving a stolen vehicle driving on the wrong side of the freeway ends with an arrest.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect is arrested after officers find a loaded gun during a routine search. Two men are detained after suspected of battery. Officers arrest a man pick-pocketing during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers assist a bondsman after a fugitive and his girlfriend refuse to surrender. An officer pulls over a teen who attempts to ingest a bag of marijuana while the officer isn’t looking. An officer makes an arrest after the female suspect has an outstanding warrant.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A jaywalker with no ID bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An armed trespasser uses a young dog as a shield. A woman under the influence goes on a rampage, tearing into homes and people. A cat lady calls the cops when her neighbors get nosy.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An Officer’s patrol of an area known for drug activity turns into a foot chase that ends with the suspect running into a tree. Two suspects are arrested during an undercover sting designed to capture online child predators.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies chase a man who flees a routine traffic stop. Deputies find drugs on a man who gives them an expired license. Officers respond to a man attacking several patrons in a bar.

programme.desc: Tony and Paulie investigate a puzzling arson case.

programme.desc: Hunter and McCall must protect a sleazy criminal who has been given immunity for fingering a top criminal.

programme.desc: A serial sex killer with a penchant for the personals forces Rita to put herself on the line.

programme.desc: After arresting a woman for the murder of her business partners, Tom and Cassy uncover evidence that she may have been framed.

programme.desc: Cassy arrests the District Attorneys lobotomized son for murder.

programme.desc: After a former partner she accused of corruption is killed, Cassy suspects his involvement in the theft of $10 million.

programme.desc: A murder threatens to expose a manicurists extortion scheme.

programme.desc: Tony sets out to prove a mental patient isnt guilty of murder.

programme.desc: Tony must protect an aggressive defense lawyer whose methods he doesnt like.

programme.desc: After Tony arrests Stans murderer and Ross is convicted, he and his family must take refuge

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: A mysterious drug overdose leads to a murder investigation; Tony battles an informers attempt to cheat a lie detector.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: By returning home to honor the one-year anniversary of his fiancees death, Reno puts himself precariously close to Lt. Dixons deadly clutches.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno finds himself in a precarious situation when he becomes the latest target of a bounty hunter known as a "living legend" as well as Bobbys teacher and mentor.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E20 Broken On The Wheel Of Love

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: News reports of Lt. Enrique Vilas escape from El Salvador are accompanied by offers of a $100,000 reward for his capture.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: A motivational speaker uses Reno and Bobby to avoid being ruined by his scandalous past.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: After Reno saves Rikki Yeager from a psychotic bounty hunter, his attempt to turn her over goes up in smoke when the plane sent for their transport explodes in an obvious ambush plot.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno stirs up more than memories when he heads back to the location of his rookie beat to search for , a reluctant gang banger wanted for murder.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: A man who was going to turn his money to his wife leaving his children out is killed. And naturally the investigation focuses on the children.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: A girl with multiple personalities is accused in the murder of her abusive mother.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: A serial luller stalks Palm Beach.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: Chris and Rita pose as an engaged couple and attend a sex therapy clinic.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: A familys tragic past obscures the truth about the murder of its patriarch.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: The death of another female cop has a deep psychological effect on Rita.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Water, Water Everywhere
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they dive deep into the wonderful world of water. In this week’s experiments we discover how water can start a fire, transform breakfast cereal into a magnetic field detector, and even change the way you visualize the world around you.

programme.title: Magnificent Mixtures
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they amalgamate in the name of science. In this week’s experiments we mix up some fireworks made from tin foil, whip up a stinky polymer, and try out an alchemy staple - turning lead into gold.

programme.title: Up and Atom
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they break open the atomic bonds that connect our world. This week’s experiments blow open the science behind creating a glowing pickle, how forensic teams extract DNA, and how acids can transform simple household items to their core.

programme.title: Hot Hot Heat
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they turn up the thermostat and discover the role heat plays in science. This week’s experiments investigate how to send secret messages with heat.

programme.title: Explosive Elements
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests discover the unstable world of elemental gasses. This week’s experiments include recreating a big bang with lithium, the incendiary power of methane, and how a little bit of liquified nitrogen can lend a lot of power to a rocket.

programme.title: Colorful Conundrums
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they taste the scientific rainbow. This week’s experiments highlight how electricity can tint titanium, how you can create a color wheel by lighting things on fire, and why the world gets all its colors from white light.

programme.title: Dont Believe Your Eyes
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they make science look like sorcery. This week’s experiments delve into the possibilities of mind control, why objects and people tend to sync together, and the magical mysteries behind magnesium.

programme.title: The Sound of Science
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they tune into the science behind sound. This week’s experiments hit high notes as we discover the physics of theremins, investigate how the outer ear impacts human hearing, and put on a laser show with cymatics.

programme.title: Science on Fire
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they kindle our curiosity about the science behind fire. This week’s experiments investigate how you can burn metal using only a 9 volt battery, what fire can teach us about calories, and why a little bit of sodium can cause a gigantic explosion.

programme.title: Invisible Impacts
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they shine a light on the unseen science behind our everyday lives. This week’s experiments explore the resonant frequencies of bridges and human bodies.

programme.title: Water, Water Everywhere
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they dive deep into the wonderful world of water. In this week’s experiments we discover how water can start a fire, transform breakfast cereal into a magnetic field detector, and even change the way you visualize the world around you.

programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they amalgamate in the name of science. In this week’s experiments we mix up some fireworks made from tin foil, whip up a stinky polymer, and try out an alchemy staple - turning lead into gold.

programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they break open the atomic bonds that connect our world. This week’s experiments blow open the science behind creating a glowing pickle, how forensic teams extract DNA, and how acids can transform simple household items to their core.

programme.title: Transcontinental Railroad
programme.desc: The Americans who settled the west, those icons of freedom and independence, lived at the mercy of the railroad tycoons.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: The Cold War was won not by weapons of war, but blue jeans, silk stockings, and fast food. Just follow the money.

programme.title: Civil War
programme.desc: Why, as a teenager in New Jersey in the 1980s, was Peter Sagal taught the Southern myth of the Civil War? Slaves = money = power.

programme.title: Watergate
programme.desc: Like a burger and fries, Nixon and scandal have always gone together. But why did his men break into the Watergate office building? Why did Nixon crave personal wealth?

programme.title: John Doy and the Immortal 10
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: John Doy is arrested along the Underground Railroad, but his friends are determined to set him free.

programme.title: Breaking out of Libby Prison
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: A band of POWs held in the Confederate capital attempt the Civil War’s largest prison escape.

programme.title: Pauline Cushman: Tales of a Yankee Spy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: When actress and Union spy Pauline Cushman is captured, her performance skills offer her a way out.

programme.title: Rebel Raid in Vermont
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: Confederate raiders attack a small town in Vermont. A local posse tries to cut off their escape.

programme.title: Robert Smalls: Steamboat to Freedom
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: Robert Smalls is enslaved, but he has the skills and the nerve to sail a rebel ship to freedom.

programme.title: Into the Rebel Swamp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: Wallace Turnage was born a slave. He made multiple escape attempts. But on his sixth - and final - attempt, he endured a genuine odyssey.

programme.title: The Dogs of Hurricane Dorian
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug Thron takes his infrared drone from the hurricane-devastated Bahamas to the wildfire scorched hills of California, locating and rescuing dogs, horses, and more.

programme.title: Lost Dogs of Louisiana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: In the wake of Hurricane Laura, Doug heads to Louisiana to help a local firefighter find his lost dog and begin rescue operations in the hard-hit city of Lake Charles.

programme.title: 13 Days After Hurricane Laura
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: With the help of expert animal rescuer, Aja Estro, Doug continues his tireless search and rescue missions across the town of Lake Charles following Hurricane Laura.

programme.title: Oregon Fire Cats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug ventures into the charred neighborhoods of Talent, OR with an old friend, Shannon Jay, to save any of the unlucky felines left behind in the wildfire evacuations.

programme.title: Puerto Rico Rescue Pups
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug is called to Puerto Rico to help old friend and rescue partner, Aja Estro, with the massive stray dog population and hoarding cases across the island.

programme.title: Chasing Ghost
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug checks in on some of the dogs he’s rescued before turning his attention to the high desert outside LA and a boxer who’s spent 15 months fending for itself.

programme.title: Island Dogs
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: In our season opener, Doug takes his drone to the Dominican Republic to rescue puppies that have been abandoned in the municipal town dump.

programme.title: Urban Hyenas
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug travels to Malawi, in Central Africa, to work with hyena researchers who are eager to employ his drone. What the infrared camera shows them will surprise them all.

programme.title: Bats of Malawi
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug visits Malawi, in Central Africa, to experiment in ways his drone can assist wildlife conservation research… pioneering work that can revolutionize field science.

programme.title: Dixie Fire Foxes
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: After the Dixie Fire devastates the CA town of Greenville, Doug heads in with his old friend Shannon to rescue the lost cats and wild animals that have been left behind.

programme.title: Tornado Town
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: In the season finale, Doug takes his drone to the tornado-ravaged towns of Kentucky to rescue the slew of cats and dogs that have been lost in the brutal December storm.

programme.title: LIKE BUTTON | The Unintended Consequences of the Facebook Like Button
programme.desc: When first presented with the like button (then dubbed “the awesome button”) Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg had a simple response: “No.”

programme.title: CUBICLE | How the Cubicle Became Universally Hated
programme.desc: A futuristic designer, Robert Propst, dreamed up “The Action Office” as a workplace utopia that would unleash the modern knowledge worker’s vast untapped potential.

programme.title: BARCODE | How The Barcode Shaped Our Modern Economy
programme.desc: Barcodes have radically changed global commerce, helping fuel the rise of everything from massive companies like Walmart to world powers like China.

programme.title: FLORIDA | How Real Estate Rogues Invented Florida As We Know It
programme.desc: In the 1920s, an army of real estate boosters set out to redefine Florida from an economic backwater to a vacation hotspot.

programme.title: MAUVE | The Fake Color That Made Our Modern World
programme.desc: In 1856, a chemistry student accidentally created a strange substance with a rich purple hue -- the world’s first synthetic dye.

programme.title: VANILLA | The Bean That Shaped the Future of Food
programme.desc: In 1841 on the small island of Reunion, a 12-year-old slave did something no one had done before; artificially pollinate the vanilla plant.

programme.title: WIFI | The Hollywood Actress Who Laid the Groundwork For Wi-Fi
programme.desc: Actress Hedy Lamarr, “the worlds most beautiful woman,” had a knack for inventing. During WWII, she devised a technology designed to intercept Axis communications.

programme.title: STREAMING | The Invention That Revolutionized Streaming Video
programme.desc: The early days of online video were plagued by low resolution, stamp-sized video, and unbearable buffering times. But one day that all changed.

programme.title: INTERSTATE | How The Interstate Connected and Divided America
programme.desc: Dwight Eisenhower’s interstate highway system was the biggest infrastructure project of its time, a bold plan to connect all corners of America.

programme.title: EDISON | How Edison Reinvented Invention
programme.desc: Edison pioneered the world’s first research and development center in Menlo Park, New Jersey.

programme.title: Bekas
programme.desc: 1990-luvun alussa, Saddam Husseinin hallinto painostaa Irakin kurdialuetta. Kaksi koditonta kurdipoikaanakee Terasmiehen kaupungin ensimmaisessa elokuvateatterissa ja paattaa lahtea Amerikkaan.Paastaakseen sinne he tarvitsevat passit, rahaa ja paljon onnea. Vaikka heilla ei ole mitaan naista, healoittavat silti matkan, joka vie heita kohti unelmaa Amerikasta.Elokuva on Karzan Kaderin esikoisohjaus ja kahden veljeksen rooleissa nahdaan Sarwar Fazil ja Zamand Taha.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: Vuonna 1944, tuhansittain Ita-Euroopan juutalaisia kuolee joukkoteurastuksissa. Vaimonsa kuoleman jalkeen toimimaan havahtunut unkarilainen asianajaja Sonson paatyy johtamaan vastarintaliikkeen aatteellista taistelua kasvavan epatoivon vallassa toimivaa, vaarallista natsiarmeijaa vastaan. Yhdistamalla uskalluksen ja uhkarohkeuden hapeilemattomyyteen, Sonson kaantaa silkan selviytymistaistelun joksikin paljon merkittavammaksi – keinoksi kostaa omiensa kuolema pelastamalla tuhansia muita.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Journeyman
programme.desc: Puolustettuaan titteliaan rankassa ottelussa, nyrkkeilyn keskisarjan maailmanmestari Matty Burton romahtaa. Matka kohti puhe-, liikunta- ja muistikyvyn palautumista tulee olemaan rankin hanen otteluistaan, mutta palkinto on tyon arvoista, kun hanen suhteensa vaimo Emmaan ja tytar Miaan on pelissa.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire
programme.desc: Tositarina irlantilaisesta havittajalentaja Brendan ”Paddy” Finucanesta, josta vain 21-vuotiaana tuli Royal Air Forcen nuorin laivueenkomentaja ja yksi toisen maailmansodan suurimmista ja palkituimmista havittaja-assista.

programme.title: Evil Stepmom
programme.desc: Kun kaksoset haluavat auttaa isaansa deittailemaan uudelleen, he luovat hanelle profiilin deittisivustolle. Vastauksen saaminen ei kesta kauan. Toinen kaksostytoista ystavystyy uuden naisystavan tyttaren kanssa, mutta han tajuaa pian, ettei kaikki ole kohdallaan. Mutta miten han saa vasta rakastuneen isansa huomaamaan asian vakavuuden?

programme.title: Sokkeloita ja hirvioita
programme.desc: Robbiella ja hanen yliopistokavereillaan on pakkomielle roolipelista ’Sokkeloita ja hirvioita’. Mutta peli saa oudon kaanteen, kun Robbie alkaa kokea nakyja heidan pelattuaan paikallisen mystisen maamerkin luona.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: Synchronicity
programme.desc: "Fyysikko Jim Beale on keksinyt aikakoneen, joka mullistaa maailman. Kun vaikutusvaltainen pohatta Klaus Meisner kuulee keksinnosta, han paattaa omia koneen hinnalla milla hyvansa. Jotta keksinto ei joutuisi vaariin kasiin, Jim paattaa matkustaa ajassa taaksepain muuttaakseen asioita. Sundancen elokuvajuhlien lempilapsen Jacob Gentryn elokuva, Synchronicity, on aivonystyroita kutkuttava ‘Scifi Noir’, joka kulkee Blade Runnerin, Gattacan ja Mementon jalanjaljissa."

programme.title: Gringa
programme.desc: Ongelmia kokenut teinitytto lahtee Meksikoon etsimaan isaansa, jota han ei edes tunne. He opettelevat yhdessa olemaan perhe, vaikka ensin heita yhdistavat vain menetykset.

programme.title: Before Dawn
programme.desc: Nuori mies jattaa perheensa lammastilan taakseen Australian takamailla ja liittyy maanmiestensa joukkoon lansirintamalle ensimmaiseen maailmansotaan. Heidan tavoitteenaan on nopeuttaa verisen konfliktin paattymista. Mutta sodan raivotessa miehen taytyy selvita juoksuhautojen ankarassa todellisuudessa ja taistelun valittomassa vaarassa pysyakseen hengissa – ja jattamatta ketaan taakseen.

programme.title: Winged Creatures
programme.desc: Tavallinen paiva tavallisessa ravintolassa Los Angelesissa. Rauha rikkoutuu silmanrapayksessa, kun psykopaatti astelee sisaan ravintolaan, ottaa aseen esiin ja alkaa ampua eparoimatta ympariinsa. Osa ihmisista kuolee. Henkiinjaaneet yrittavat ymmartaa mita on tapahtunut, ja miten elamalle saa taas uuden merkityksen ja turvallisuuden tunteen.

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: Kolme miesta saapuu autiolle saarelle Skotlannin edustalla vartioimaan majakkaa. Eraana paivana vedenrajasta loytyy tiedoton mies vieressaan suuri arkullinen kultaa.., Tasta seuraa vainoharhoista, eristyksesta ja ahneudesta syntyva eloonjaamistaistelu. Gerard Butler (300, Angel Has Fallen) loistaa roolissaan rehellisena perheenisana, jonka mystiset olosuhteet pakottavat aarirajoilleen. Elokuvan on ohjannut tanskalainen Kristoffer Nyholm (Taboo, Rikos) ja myos tanskalainen Søren Malling (Pinnan alla, Sota) nahdaan ratkaisevassa sivuroolissa. Elokuva pohjaa tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.
Nuoren kirjailijan on hyvaksyttava kuolevaisuutensa kun hanella todetaan harvinainen syopa.Parhaan ystavansa ja empaattisen nuoren terapeutin avulla han loytaa rohkeuden taistella sairautta vastaan.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: Journeyman
programme.desc: Puolustettuaan titteliaan rankassa ottelussa, nyrkkeilyn keskisarjan maailmanmestari Matty Burton romahtaa. Matka kohti puhe-, liikunta- ja muistikyvyn palautumista tulee olemaan rankin hanen otteluistaan, mutta palkinto on tyon arvoista, kun hanen suhteensa vaimo Emmaan ja tytar Miaan on pelissa.

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: From Time to Time
programme.desc: Kummittava aavetarina, joka kattaa kaksi maailmaa, yli vuosisadan erolla. Kun 13-vuotias Tolly saa selville, etta han voi salaperaisesti matkustaa naiden kahden valilla, han aloittaa seikkailun, joka paljastaa sukupolvien ajan haudatut perheen salaisuudet.

programme.title: Sokkeloita ja hirvioita
programme.desc: Robbiella ja hanen yliopistokavereillaan on pakkomielle roolipelista ’Sokkeloita ja hirvioita’. Mutta peli saa oudon kaanteen, kun Robbie alkaa kokea nakyja heidan pelattuaan paikallisen mystisen maamerkin luona.

programme.title: Jimmy P.
programme.desc: Huolestunut Amerikan alkuperaisasukas muodostaa poikkeuksellisen ystavyyden ranskalaisen psykoanalyytikon kanssa, kun he yrittavat loytaa parannuskeinon karsimykselleen.

programme.title: Zalava
programme.desc: Vuonna 1978 Zalavan syrjaisen vuoristokylan asukkaat ovat kauhuissaan nakymattoman vaaran edessa. He vaittavat, etta heidan kylaansa riivaa demoni ja palkkaavat manaajan ajamaan hengen pois. Mutta kun nuori kersantti Massoud pidattaa manaajan petoksesta, tilanne muuttuu.

programme.title: 30:e november
programme.desc: Adam kavereineen kayttaa aikaansa vihaamiensa maahanmuuttajien hairikointiin. Sitten Adam tapaa perulaisen Julian ja he salamarakastuvat. He tapaavat salassa, koska Adamin kaverit tai Julian perhe eivat hyvaksyisi suhdetta. Ruotsin kansallispaivana Adam kavereineen kohtaavat Julian veli Saschan ystavineen. Kohtaaminen johtaa kahden kuolemaan.

programme.title: Enter the Void
programme.desc: 2000-luvun pahamaineisimman elokuvan ohjaaja tekee paluun teoksella, joka on jotain aivan uutta: tunteita kuohuttava ja visuaalisesti valloittava painajaismatka halki elaman, kuoleman ja jalleensyntyman. Palkittu Enter the Void on tummasavyinen, mutta silti raiskyva odysseia nahtyna kuolemaa tekevan paahenkilon houreisin silmin. Tokion neonvaloyossa ammutaan nuori diileri Oscar. Ilman hanen siskoaan tarina paattyisi siihen. Mutta Oscar vannoi aikoinaan, ettei koskaan hylkaisi siskoaan, ja kun hanen ruumiinsa kuolee, alkaa sielun levoton vaellus suurkaupungin likaisilla kujilla ja muistojen synkilla kaytavilla, jotka vaaristyvat minuutti minuutilta.

programme.title: The Railway Murders

programme.title: The Railway Murders
programme.desc: Jimmy Alcott was a troubled young man. He had joined the army after leaving school, but his time in Germany ended in disgrace when he was court-martialled for the violent murder of a civilian.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...
