programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A California teen went missing. Police suspected shed run away until her body was discovered in a ditch.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man is found dead in his home, and his ex-wife has a perfect alibi. To determine time of death, investigators need to know when the victim ate his last meal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a talented television news anchor is shot to death outside her home, it appears to be a crime of passion perpetrated by an obsessed fan.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Just weeks before a witness is to testify against the man accused of sexually assaulting her, she is murdered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two young children was found dead in her bedroom. Her death was ruled a suicide - but when investigators learned she had almost died in a house fire three years earlier, they decided to take another look at the evidence.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman who suffered from mental illness is found dead. Was it due to natural causes, suicide or murder?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: No one in a residential community saw anything the day one of their neighbors was brutally murdered. Fingerprints found at the crime scene helped investigators to apprehend the presumed killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A computer crash pushed a manufacturing company to the brink of collapse. Investigators must determine if the crash was the result of a sabotage.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Firefighters found an entire family dead inside their home it looked like a murder-suicide, but there were several inconsistent clues in the rubble.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young woman disappeared, police feared she was the latest victim in a string of similar crimes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Rosemary Anderson is found dead on the side of the road, her boyfriend becomes the prime suspect. He eventually confessed to her murder, but so did another man - serial killer, Eric Edgar Cooke.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police were puzzled by an obscure print found at a crime scene where one man had been killed and two teenage girls were seriously injured.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The investigation into the kidnapping and rape of an 18-year-old Ohio woman is aided when the victim returns hours after the incident occurred. With her help, the police are able to track the assailant to his front door.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A brilliant young architect became ill and died just before she was to testify in a criminal trial. The autopsy revealed shed been poisoned with arsenic. Investigators had to determine which person who knew her had a motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Chris Ochoa confessed to the 1988 rape and murder of Nancy DePriest, the case was closed. 8 years later, Achim Marino confessed to the same crime. Can DNA evidence identify the real perpetrator?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A behavioral profile caused the Baton Rouge Police Department to search for the wrong man. They might not have made an arrest had it not been for a DNA picture of the suspect painted by a molecular biologist.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a talented television news anchor is shot to death outside her home, it appears to be a crime of passion perpetrated by an obsessed fan.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Prompted by news of a flight attendants brutal murder, the son of a previous victim contacts police.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The wife of an Air Force officer was found dead in her bed with a plastic laundry bag near her face. Further investigation proved that the scene had been staged. Her death wasnt an accident, it was cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A two-man shrimp boat sinks when a fast-moving, violent storm strikes the Louisiana coast. The captain drowns, but the deckhand is rescued fourteen hours later. The crewman is hailed as a hero - until the captains body is discovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an elderly couple died in a suspicious house fire, their son became the prime suspect. Investigators turned to forensic science to determine if the fire had been set deliberately, or if it was an unfortunate accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, a high school girl vanished after attending a party. The prime suspect had two alibi witnesses for the night she disappeared. A solid alibi can often overcome circumstantial evidence, but forensic evidence is another matter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A beautiful young woman falls to her death from a cliff overlooking the ocean. Initially, investigators think it was a tragic accident. But after a forensic examination, police uncover a very different picture of what happened.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murder of a millionaire indicated robbery, but investigators wondered if there was something more.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: No one in a residential community saw anything the day one of their neighbors was brutally murdered. Fingerprints found at the crime scene helped investigators to apprehend the presumed killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two people witness a truck driving over an unconscious man and flee into a nearby bar, but when the police turn up, the truck, the man and the witnesses are gone.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An Alaskan police officer finds a womans body while on routine patrol of a public park. During the autopsy, the medical examiner preserves the portion of her rib cage which sustained the fatal wound.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A college student was found dead, and the evidence suggested he knew his killer. Three hairs and some microscopic cells helped police to unravel a web of lies, and find the motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappeared along a California highway in 1991. Three years later, the case was solved when a mans refrigerated truck was looked upon with suspicion.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The wife of a murdered horse rancher explains that the last time she saw her husband was when he was leaving the house to go jogging. Police become suspicious when forensic evidence eventually leads investigators back to the ranch.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police are led on a wild goose chase when the wife of a prominent banker is kidnapped. An entomologists unexpected discovery leads to a new suspect - and the realization that ordinary office equipment can leave extraordinary clues.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An obstetrician returned home from the hospital and found his wife on the bathroom floor. She was covered with blood and not breathing. He tried unsuccessfully to revive her, staining his clothes with her blood in the process, and then he called 911.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1987 disappearance of Houston resident Tracy Jo Shine is recalled. The investigation went cold until 2000 when a "cold case squad" learned that the womans ex-boyfriend Michael Neal had bragged about killing her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of 16-year-old Leanne Tiernan was discovered nine months after she disappeared. Forensic scientists found clues that painted a virtual portrait of her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police are dispatched to the scene of a shooting, and discover the victims husband is one of their own: a homicide detective who says his wife accidentally shot herself in the head.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fire erupted in Kings Cross Station, killing 31 people and injuring dozens more. Investigators pinpointed the cause of the fire with state-of-the-art technology.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is shot to death in her store just one day before she is to testify against the man accused of robbing her. The robber becomes the prime suspect, but he has a solid alibi.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators sift through the ashes of a fire which killed a 40-year-old woman. The fire appears to have been started by an unattended cigarette. On closer look, forensic scientists discover the cause was far more complicated.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1996 investigation into 48-year-old Martha Hansens murder is helped by a legal requirement that bars have video cameras installed on the premises.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Janet Overton died suspiciously in 1988, and the investigation hit a dead end when the autopsy indicated no foul play was involved. A telephone tip and the sensitive nose of a forensic examiner indicated otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teen was killed by her parents in what they said was self-defense, but forensic evidence told otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While investigating the murder of 9-year-old Jessica Knott, police use a garbage bag to connect a suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, the founder of American Atheists disappeared with one of her sons, her granddaughter and $500,000 in gold coins. The police investigated several suspects, including David R. Waters, who worked for American Atheists.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is killed while walking her dogs in the woods. Since she has no enemies and her husband has an alibi, police assume its a hunting accident - until they find a strange letter, allegedly written by the woman before her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man tells police he shot an intruder who killed his wife. Forensic evidence disproves that story later on.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The only clue recovered from a shooting is a twelve-guage shotgun. Scientists use unique methods to lift the serial number from the weapon to trace it to its owner

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the 1980s, a trio of unsolved murders occurred in Wichita Falls, Texas. Later, a fourth murder from the same time period provided the police with far more than they realized.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Bombings are difficult to solve, because the perpetrator isnt usually at the scene, and the evidence goes up in smoke. In this case pieces of plastic the size of grains of sand hold the key to a mans murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A killer tried to incinerate and destroy everything that could link him to his crime. But in doing so, he inadvertently created new forensic evidence, evidence which came to light with a technique never before used in a criminal investigation.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man is found dead in his home, and his ex-wife has a perfect alibi. To determine time of death, investigators need to know when the victim ate his last meal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Authorities track a kidnapper who let his victim write a last will and informed the family of her murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappears without a trace. Even though foul play is suspected, the leads dont pan out and the trail turns cold. Twenty years would pass before police are able to link a clump of hair discovered in an isolated area with the missing woman.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in a ravine, but crucial crime scene evidence had been washed away by severe thunderstorms. Almost 20 years later, an old hat brought the killer to justice.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A three-year-old develops a respiratory condition. His father has Alzheimers. An investigator reveals that their ill health is due to mold in their modern home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two vanishes after a shopping trip. Her body is discovered a month later. Witnesses say they saw the victim being forced into a car by an unknown person.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an 11-year-old girl disappeared from a small town in a remote area of Alaska, investigators wondered if shed been attacked by a bear or become lost in the dense woods.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A neighbor watched as a man stabbed his wife, pushed her into the swimming pool and held her head under water.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After the murder of Seattle residents, evidence from the couples dog eventually ties a murderer to the scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1988, the body of a young woman was discovered in an Ohio river. Most of the evidence had been washed away, but the victims 6-year-old son unwittingly told investigators all they needed to know - without saying a word. The clue was in his genes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A married couple decided to escape the cold of winter with a mini-vacation in Key West. The wife went missing, and police searched every square inch of the island, they found nothing but a pair of sandals which might have belonged to her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2002, the eyes of the world were on Virginia and Maryland. A serial sniper was on the loose, killing innocent, unsuspecting citizens. Just how was he caught?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The only clue recovered from a shooting is a twelve-guage shotgun. Scientists use unique methods to lift the serial number from the weapon to trace it to its owner

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After the murder of Seattle residents, evidence from the couples dog eventually ties a murderer to the scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The decomposed body of a young woman was discovered in a Bakersfield irrigation canal. If there was trace evidence, it had been washed away.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In an affluent suburb, police were called to the scene of what appeared to be an accidental drowning.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police were puzzled by an obscure print found at a crime scene where one man had been killed and two teenage girls were seriously injured.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is killed while walking her dogs in the woods. Since she has no enemies and her husband has an alibi, police assume its a hunting accident - until they find a strange letter, allegedly written by the woman before her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Emergency dispatch received a call from a man who said his girlfriend shot and killed herself. The autopsy revealed that the gunshot wound was not self-inflicted and the evidence on her body would give police a golden opportunity to catch her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a man is shot down in his garage, police discover that a wound on the widow may have been self-inflicted.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A serial arsonist starts several fires that cause millions of dollars worth of damage and the deaths of three people. He is discovered, partly through the use of forensic hypnosis.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three seemingly unrelated deaths proved to be serial murders. The killer used poison which had no taste.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, California firefighters battled ten arson fires in three weeks. When cigarettes and a scrap of paper connected the case to similar fires further north, the hunt was on for a dangerous pyromaniac.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When police recovered the car of a missing man, they expected to find his body - but it wasnt there.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An employee of a dry cleaner was raped and murdered in the store. Police turned to forensic science for the answers they needed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the case of the Center City Rapist and the murder of Shannon Schieber, Philadelphia authorities use an anonymous letter and geographic profiling to hone in on a suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An Alaskan police officer finds a womans body while on routine patrol of a public park. During the autopsy, the medical examiner preserves the portion of her rib cage which sustained the fatal wound.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young TV news producer is raped and murdered in her apartment. Investigators turn to the Commonwealth of Virginias DNA Databank.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1962, the people of the small town of Hanford, California lost their sense of peace when one of their own, 15-year-old Marlene Miller, was murdered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police investigate a discarded sleeping bag containing bloody sneakers and a purse, which eventually leads to the body of a young woman. A mark found on the victims body enables police to track the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2002, the eyes of the world were on Virginia and Maryland. A serial sniper was on the loose, killing innocent, unsuspecting citizens. Just how was he caught?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Exploring how an American hit single from 1966 -- "The Cheater" by Bob Kuban and the In-Men -- foreshadowed the demise of the groups lead singer, Walter Scott.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A suspicious fire swept through an apartment killing two young women. A closer look at the fire scene revealed something hidden in the ashes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of 16-year-old Leanne Tiernan was discovered nine months after she disappeared. Forensic scientists found clues that painted a virtual portrait of her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two vanishes after a shopping trip. Her body is discovered a month later. Witnesses say they saw the victim being forced into a car by an unknown person.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an elderly couple died in a suspicious house fire, their son became the prime suspect. Investigators turned to forensic science to determine if the fire had been set deliberately, or if it was an unfortunate accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman who suffered from mental illness is found dead. Was it due to natural causes, suicide or murder?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A killer tried to incinerate and destroy everything that could link him to his crime. But in doing so, he inadvertently created new forensic evidence, evidence which came to light with a technique never before used in a criminal investigation.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A police officer accused of killing his estranged wife insists she committed suicide. Investigators say it was murder - that it was physically impossible for the woman to have shot herself.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A two-man shrimp boat sinks when a fast-moving, violent storm strikes the Louisiana coast. The captain drowns, but the deckhand is rescued fourteen hours later. The crewman is hailed as a hero - until the captains body is discovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the 1980s, a trio of unsolved murders occurred in Wichita Falls, Texas. Later, a fourth murder from the same time period provided the police with far more than they realized.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, the founder of American Atheists disappeared with one of her sons, her granddaughter and $500,000 in gold coins. The police investigated several suspects, including David R. Waters, who worked for American Atheists.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 29-year-old woman was killed instantly when a bomb exploded in her home. The device was so powerful that shrapnel was embedded in houses across the street. The bomber had not only knowledge and skill, but also a motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: California police had several suspects in the robbery and brutal murder of an elderly couple. Ten years later, a determined forensic scientist used material from a dentists office to uncover ballistic evidence that had been overlooked.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murder of an American tourist in a Mexican resort draws law enforcement resources in both countries.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police hoped the shoe impressions found at a crime scene would put their investigation back on track.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young boy went missing, police organized the largest search in the history of their small town.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man riding a bicycle was fatally injured, and police believed he was the victim of a hit-and-run accident. Tiny clues found at the scene created a picture of the vehicle which struck him and led police to its driver.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A college student was found dead, and the evidence suggested he knew his killer. Three hairs and some microscopic cells helped police to unravel a web of lies, and find the motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Indiana police identified Richard Alexander as the "River Park Rapist" who assaulted four women that year. Later, DNA analysis casts doubt on his conviction.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 19-year-old woman was found dead in her car, the scene had been staged to make murder appear to be suicide. During their investigation, police discovered the victim was involved in a love quadrangle, giving several people a motive to kill her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman suddenly becomes critically ill, eventually leaving her unable to walk. A bone marrow test reveals the cause: arsenic poisoning. Investigators must determine if the poisoning was caused by groundwater contamination or something more sinister.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a talented television news anchor is shot to death outside her home, it appears to be a crime of passion perpetrated by an obsessed fan.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman convicted of killing her mother in a car fire is granted a new trial. An expert witness has a different opinion as to how the fire started and, if proven, would clear the woman of any culpability.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murder of a millionaire indicated robbery, but investigators wondered if there was something more.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1996 investigation into 48-year-old Martha Hansens murder is helped by a legal requirement that bars have video cameras installed on the premises.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, a high school girl vanished after attending a party. The prime suspect had two alibi witnesses for the night she disappeared. A solid alibi can often overcome circumstantial evidence, but forensic evidence is another matter.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 98 features the highly anticipated return of Jamal Ben Saddik (36-9, 29 KO) against the Estonian powerhouse Uku Jurjendal (20-9, 16 KO). In the co-main event of the evening, GLORY Welterweight World Champion Chico Kwasi (43-5-1, 23 KO) is set to defend his title against number two ranked welterweight Teodor Hristov (18-3, 7 KO). Meanwhile, two of 2024’s best prospects will clash as Cem Caceres (18-1, 14 KO) faces Mory Kromah (31-2-1, 18 KO).

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Three returning contenders from the North East are reunited in a culinary rematch. Colin McGurran, Stephanie Moon and Charlie Lakin. The three North East chefs will be judged by a veteran of the competition Michelin star chef Jason Atherton.

programme.desc: In todays programme the chefs cook their fish courses. Will former champion Colin McGurrans dish inspired by his childhood memories, Cockles and Mussels with Salmon inspire veteran judge Jason Atherton?

programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs from the North East. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the turn of three chefs from Northern Ireland - Chris Fearon, Raymond McArdle, and Ian Orr - who will be judged by a veteran of the competition Michelin star chef Glynn Purnell.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The three Northern Ireland chefs cook their fish course. Chris Fearon serves up a creation called Stitched up like a kipper, Raymond McArdle serves Turbot called A day at the beach and Ian Orr creates a dish called Why did the scallop cross the roe.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its time for the main course. Chris Fearons dish called Cowboy supper is inspired by the Wild West. Raymond McArdle creates a dish called Titanic smoked venison, tongue and cheek while Ian Orr cooks lamb and baked hay.

programme.desc: The curtain raises on London and the South East - newcomers Matt Gillan and Adam Simmonds come face-to-face with returning contender Tom Aikens. Today its the starter course and someone makes a schoolboy error.

programme.sub-title: S08 : E37 London and South East Fish
programme.desc: Today its the fish course and Tom and Matt battle it out with scallop dishes while Adam delivers Langoustine and Oysters. But who will come out on top?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Actress Patricia Hodge, one of the stars of sit com Miranda will join judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort to taste all eight winning regional starter courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs cook their fish courses. Theyre all vying to finish in the top three and still be in with a chance of cooking at the special banquet.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its judgement day as the chefs not only learn the top three desserts but the judges announce the winning menu. Fast show writer and performer Charlie Higson helps judge the puddings.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the climax of the competition as the winning chefs cook at the Comic Relief Banquet at the Royal Albert Hall. But its not plain sailing - the chefs have to contend with getting into the kitchen late.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: The Glory Guys
programme.desc: What could be worse for two cavalry officers than to battle with native tribes? To battle each other for the same woman.

programme.title: Six Bounty Killers for a Massacre
programme.desc: The Governor of Kansas hires six gunfighters to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the self-appointed sheriff of Abilene who is holding several hostages including his family.

programme.title: Three Graves for a Winchester
programme.desc: Ringo Carson has a tough life. First, he has a falling out with his best friend, Frank Sanders, after saving Jane, the girl he loves, from Mexican kidnappers in order to extort a ransom from her gunrunner father.

programme.title: Beyond The Law
programme.desc: A trio of thieves plot to steal a towns silver shipment but a turn of events makes them the towns heroes.

programme.title: The Counterfeit Kid
programme.desc: Jack, a simple farmhand must get help from a group of wild misfits and find treasure before the outlaw hes been impersonating finds him.

programme.title: Sugar Colt
programme.desc: In order to avenge a friend and to fulfill his last wish, Rocco has to find out what happened to an army corps that has mysteriously disappeared. He therefore puts on the disguise of a doctor and starts investigating in a somewhat uncomfortable town.

programme.title: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive
programme.desc: The Winchester Does Not Forgive - When the stagecoach in which they travel is attacked by Monteiros gang, Lash accepts to kill his friend to save his bacon.

programme.title: Those Dirty Dogs
programme.desc: Near Fort Apache, Mexican bandits raid a U.S. Army supply column, killing soldiers and kidnapping Miss Adams. To stop the raids, President Grant sends Captain Chadwell, Lieutenant Junger, Sergeant Smith, and bounty hunter Korano. Together, they face outlaw Angelo Sanchez and the mad General Mueller in a dangerous mission.

programme.title: Damned Pistols of Dallas
programme.desc: Outlaw Fast Draw (Álvarez) assaults stagecoach with passengers Clay Stone (Beir), singer Katy Dior (Marandi) and gambler Fred Foster (Mathot), but Stone is ready to take revenge.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: A special agent from Chicago is sent out west to bring in the notorious Reno brothers.

programme.title: China 9, Liberty 37
programme.desc: The railroad hires a condemned killer to murder an uncooperative rancher but the assassin fails to deliver, prompting the railroad men to go after him instead.

programme.title: The Executioner of God
programme.desc: A former gunman turned priest seeks vengeance on three bandits who are masquerading as law-abiding citizens.

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trail Blazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone leads settlers to Kentucky, but must fight Shawnee Indians who have been convinced by a French renegade that Boone and the settlers are there to kill them and steal their land.

programme.title: Tequila aka Fuzzy the Hero
programme.desc: Tequila and Bobo hit the little town of Chedron intending to rob the local bank whose owner, De Koven, is trying to freeze out all the ranchers in the area by the simple expedient of foreclosing on the mortgages his bank holds on their land.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger (Klinton Spilsbury) of an ambush arranged by outlaw leader Major Bartholomew "Butch" Cavendish (Christopher Lloyd) returns to fight back as a great masked western hero, The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones must fight a villainous rancher to regain the land that is rightfully hers.

programme.title: The Shakiest Gun in the West
programme.desc: A pardoned stagecoach robber, becomes government agent and marries a naive unsuspecting east-coast dentist in order to join a wagon train.

programme.title: Ride Out for Revenge
programme.desc: When an Indian chief is murdered in a hateful town, a sympathizing ex marshal tries to stop the Indians from attacking for revenge.

programme.title: The Black Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Two black bounty hunters arrive in a small western town on the trail of an outlaw. Finding the town without a sheriff, they take charge, much to the displeasure of the mostly white townsfolk. As they chase women, demand money, and stir up trouble, they wait for the right moment to capture their prey, raising tensions along the way.

programme.title: The Ballad of a Gunfighter
programme.desc: An outlaw and his partner feud over the same woman.

programme.title: The Son of Zorro
programme.desc: In imperial Mexico, nobleman Don Ricardo secretly fights as the Son of Zorro against corrupt Governor Leblanche. When rebels ambush a weapons transport, killing Don Herrera, Ricardo rescues his daughter Conchita and hides her, fueling a revolution for justice and freedom.

programme.title: Dont Wait, Django... Shoot!
programme.desc: Django returns home to discover that his father has been killed by local bandits in a business deal gone wrong.

programme.title: Colt in the Hand of the Devil
programme.desc: Scotty is hired to eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits led by El Condor. He cleverly earns their trust to trap them—but as he bonds with El Condor, a true friendship and mutual respect begin to challenge his mission.

programme.title: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
programme.desc: Various factions, feud over stolen gold in a surreal town.

programme.title: The Gay Amigo
programme.desc: Mistaken for bandits, Cisco and Pancho are captured by the Captain, who releases them to track the real gang. Cisco discovers the true leaders are the editor and blacksmith. Using cunning, he sows distrust between them, gains the blacksmith’s trust, and joins the gang, setting up a trap to bring the criminals to justice.

programme.title: Red Coat
programme.desc: Cormack, the lawman most feared by the rugged pioneers at the turn of the century, has a mysterious bond with "Caribou," an outlaw whom he has jailed. When Caribou escapes from prison, he returns to seek revenge.

programme.title: Gunman of Ave Maria
programme.desc: Mann is a gunman informed by a childhood friend that his father was murdered years earlier by his mother and her lover.

programme.title: Dead Men Dont Count
programme.desc: Two gunmen ride into a town with a plan to collect a large unearned bounty but are caught up in the local war for land caused by the impending arrival of the railroad.

programme.title: The Avenging Angel
programme.desc: Miles Utley, a skilled Mormon commando and bodyguard, is forced to go rogue while investigating a deadly scandal of assassination and land speculation. As danger mounts, he must confront his beliefs and decide where his true loyalties lie in a world of betrayal and faith.

programme.title: Pray to God and Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: Fernando returns from exile in Texas seeking revenge for his siblings deaths. But instead of personal vengeance, he’s driven to spark a revolution against the oppressive landowners, transforming his mission into a fight for justice and freedom.

programme.title: Joshua The Black Rider
programme.desc: A black soldier returns from fighting for the Union in the Civil War only to find out that his mother has been murdered by a gang of white thugs.

programme.title: The Shooting
programme.desc: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.

programme.title: Spencers Holiday BBQ
programme.desc: Spencer grills and smokes his way through traditional holiday dishes with a festive menu that includes Burnt Orange Cranberry Marmalade, Maple Rye Pumpkin Pie and Smoked Turkey Two Ways.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Raivokkaassa toisen maailmansodan Saipanin taistelussa kersantti Joe Enders (Nicolas Cage) vartioi – ja ystavystyy – Ben Yahzeen (Adam Beach) kanssa, nuoren navajon, joka on koulutettu kayttamaan ainoaa sodanaikaista koodia, jota vihollinen ei koskaan murtautunut... Navajo-koodia. Mutta jos Yahzee joutuu vihollisen kasiin, kuinka pitkalle Enders on valmis menemaan pelastaakseen armeijan voimakkaimman salaisuuden? John Woo ohjaa taman toimintapitoisen eeppisen elokuvan, joka on saanut innoituksensa navajosotilaiden todellisesta tarinasta, joiden rohkeus ja uhraukset auttoivat voittamaan sodan Tyynellamerella.

programme.title: Keinottelua
programme.desc: Menestyvan liikemiehen Robert Millerin (Gere) taydelliselta vaikuttava elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen yhden kohtalokkaan erehdyksen seurauksena. Miller loytaa itsensa tasapainoilemasta perhe-elaman, yrityskauppojen, uhkaavan kavallussyytteen ja syrjahypyn ristipaineessa. Saatuaan viela sinnikkaan poliisietsiva Michael Bryerin (Roth) peraansa, joutuu Miller epatoivoiseen kujanjuoksuun yrittaessaan korjata tekemansa virheet ennen kuplan puhkeamista.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
programme.desc: Vuosi on 1985. Pastellivarien, puutelihiusten ja otsanauhojen aikakautena nuori Janey uneksii tanssijan urasta. Koulua han on ehtinyt vaihtaa jo 11 kertaa, ja han tietaa etta ne eivat muutu miksikaan. Hanen uusimmassa koulussaan on tosin jotain erikoista. Ei se etta se sijaitsee Chicagossa, vaan se etta siella tehdaan suosittua nuoriso-ohjelmaa nimelta Dance TV. Taalla Janey tapaa tanssifriikki Lynnen joka houkuttelee hanet koetanssiin, ja menestyksen ovet alkavat avautua.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: Elegy
programme.desc: David Kepesh on arvostettu yliopiston professori, jonka maailma jarkkyy, kun hanen luennoilleen ilmestyy kaunis Consuela Castillo. Consuelan kauneus ajaa professorin himon ja omistushalun pyorteeseen, jollaista han ei ole aiemmin kokenut. Mutkikas rakkaustarina saa alkunsa. Perustuu Pulitzer-palkitun Philip Rothin teokseen.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: My Old Lady
programme.desc: New Yorkissa asuva tyhjatasku Mathias perii pariisilaisasunnon isaltaan, jota han ei koskaan tuntenut. Uudessa kiinteistossa Mathiasta odottaa kuitenkin yllatys vanhahkon, sivistyneen rouva Mathilden ja hanen suojelevaisen tyttarensa asuttaessa asuntoa. Ikivanhan ranskalaisen lakipykalan vuoksi omaisuutta ei voi siirtaa perijalle ennen asukkaan, eli Mathilden kuolemaa. Mathias paattaa yrittaa asunnon myymista kaikesta huolimatta, mutta vahitellen selviaa, etta hanen isallaan ja Mathildella on ollut pitkaan yhteinen salaisuus kannettavanaan

programme.title: Passion
programme.desc: Brian De Palman ohjaama ja Rachel McAdamsin ja Noomi Rapacen tahdittama Passion on jannityksen mestarin uusin piinaava trilleri. Isabelle (Rapace) tyoskentelee suuressa mainostoimistossa hyvin tiiviissa yhteistyossa pomonsa Christinen (McAdams) kanssa. Kun Christine yllattaen varastaa Isabellen suunnitteleman mainoskampanjan ja esittelee sen eteenpain omana ideanaan valit muuttuvat hetkessa jaataviksi. Verisesti loukkaantunut Isabelle janoaa raivoissaan kostoa ja askel kerrallaan Christine tulee huomaamaan, etta tassa valtapelissa kaikki keinot ovat sallittuja.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: Keinottelua

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Mama Weed
programme.desc: Kun alipalkattu poliisin tulkki huomaa takavarikon yhteydessa, etta yksi osallisista on hanen lahipiiriaan, han tekee kohtalokkaan paatoksen. Han onnistuu takavarikoimaan jattimaisen hasiseran, jonka seka poliisi etta alamaailma haluavat, ja kenttakokemuksellaan ja poliisin resursseilla han aloittaa oman rikollisen toimintansa ja vaihtaa huumediilerin uraan.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: Kirjava huntu (The Painted Veil)
programme.desc: Laakari Walter Fane ja hanen vaimonsa Kitty ovat komennuksella Shanghaissa, jossa Walter on toissa paikallisessa sairaalassa. Walterin vaativa tyo vie kaiken liikenevan ajan ja yksinainen Kitty ajautuu englantilaisen diplomaatin Charles Townsendin syleilyyn. Kun Walter saa tietaa vaimonsa uskottomuudesta, han janoaa kostoa. Walter hyvaksyy vaarallisen tyon kiinalaisessa pikkukylassa, jossa riehuu kuolettava koleraepidemia. Kittylla ei ole muuta mahdollisuutta kuin seurata miestaan maaseudulle kauas kaikesta.

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Murha vailla syyllista
programme.desc: Vuonna 1924 mediamoguli William Randolph Hearst kokosi joitain maailman tunnetuimmista persoonallisuuksista jahtinsa matkalle, joka johti viela ratkaisemattomaan, hiljaiseen murhaan.

programme.title: Copycat - Kopiomurhaaja
programme.desc: Kunnianhimoinen etsiva koettaa vetaa rikospsykologin jalleen ihmisten ilmoille jahtaamaan tappajaa, joka kopioi muita saramurhaajia.

programme.title: Kuutio
programme.desc: Seitseman toisilleen ventovierasta henkiloa, joilla kaikilla on erilaiset persoonat, asetetaan vasten tahtoaan loputtomaan sokkeloon, joka on taynna hengenvaarallisia ansoja.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Don Martellin siloinen elama pyorii perheen, kavereiden ja punttitreenin ymparilla, minka lisaksi han kay uskollisesti kirkossa joka pyha. Kavereidensa ”Don Joniksi” ristima hurmuri iskee baarista pelkkia taydellisia naisia, joista kukaan ei kuitenkaan veda vertoja pornolle. Don joutuu arvioimaan keskenkasvuisia mieltymyksiaan uudestaan, kun han tapaa ihanan Barbaran, jonka kasitys unelmien miehesta ei vastaa lainkaan Donia.

programme.title: The Rum Diary
programme.desc: Hunter S. Thompsonin Rommipaivakirja-romaaniin pohjautuva elokuva seuraa kiertolaiselamaa viettavan reportteri Paul Kempin (Johnny Depp) viinanhuuruista matkaa halki Puerto Ricon pittoreskin saaren. Han on pian omaksunut paikallisvaeston rommiinhukuttautuvan elamantavan, ja tavattuaan hamarabisneksiin sekaantuneen amerikkalaisliikemiehen, Sandersonin (Aaron Eckhart), Paul on myos korviaan myoten retkussa miehen huumaavan kuumaan kihlattuun, Chenaultiin (Amber Heard).

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikeys much-planned D-Day tribute parachute jump with 20 paratroopers hits a wall when Joe refuses to fly his DC-3 to the drop zone.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnies 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As Joe fights a Transport Canada claim against the airline, star pilot Justin is tasked with shipping an 8,000lb generator to a remote town.
