programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 Dropped S8 - "End of the Line"
programme.desc: Alaska doesnt asks you to leave, she tells you to leave.

programme.title: Return Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Trail S1 - "Return Home"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 say goodbye to their final camp and head home.

programme.title: Edge of the Earth
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Edge of the Earth"
programme.desc: The first episode sets the stage for Chris and Caseys journey, detailing the terrain, weather, and hunting style theyll encounter. It also delves into the projects backstory and its initiation.

programme.title: On Top of the World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "On Top of the World"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey traverse waterways, muskeg, and mountains hunting a huge caribou bull. Chris hurts his knee, questioning his endurance.

programme.title: Nightmare Canyon - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Fight to Survive S3 - "Nightmare Canyon - Part 1"
programme.desc: Justin and Jeremy Harris’ weekend decent into a remote Utah canyon becomes a survival nightmare when Justin severely breaks his leg. As night fast approaches and temperatures drop below freezing, how will these two brothers survive?

programme.title: Nightmare Canyon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Fight to Survive S3 - "Nightmare Canyon - Part 2"
programme.desc: After Justin Harris severely breaks his leg deep in a remote, Utah canyon, it ‘s up to his brother Jeremy to climb out for help. Clawing his way through icy pools of water and up rock faces, pushes Jeremy to his limit.

programme.title: The Ghost of Transylvania
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "The Ghost of Transylvania"
programme.desc: Climbing the wild peaks in the story riddled the Carpathian Mountains, home to the most famous hunter of all, Dracula!

programme.title: The Bavarian Wolf in Hungary
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "The Bavarian Wolf in Hungary"
programme.desc: Journey to the rolling hills of Balaton Lake in Hungary and explore the possibilities of recreating a biodiverse agricultural future with an avid hunter.

programme.title: Religious Fervour
programme.desc: Massive crowds gather at Allahabad’s Maha Kumbh Mela and Manila’s Black Nazarene, creating major healthcare challenges. Thousands of medical personnel and volunteers are deployed to keep people safe.

programme.title: Namibian Desert Onyx
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Namibian Desert Onyx"
programme.desc: Mario was told by locals that deep in the Namibian desert there is an odd-looking creature that is great nutritional value that has been harvested by people for hundreds of years.

programme.title: Kalahari Bushmen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Kalahari Bushmen"
programme.desc: In the Kalahari Desert is an ancient tribe that has lived off the land since the beginning of man kind. These people are known as the Naru bushman.

programme.title: Rising Waters
programme.desc: As Chris and Casey Keefer continue downriver, they rely more on fish, ducks, and berries as the moose rut approaches. An epic Alaskan rainstorm brings heavy repercussions for their success.

programme.title: All Eyes On Us
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Dropped S3 - "All Eyes On Us"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer fish for dinner and edge closer to extraction. However, another encounter with a grizzly jeopardizes their safety as the bear ventures too close to camp!

programme.title: POLICE OF THE WEALTHY vs POLICE OF THE POOR
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Police Patrol S1 - "POLICE OF THE WEALTHY vs POLICE OF THE POOR"
programme.desc: In Buenos Aires, a special police unit works in marginalized neighborhoods to restore public trust. In Haiti, the police face tough challenges daily to maintain order and uphold the justice system.

programme.title: BORDER POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Police Patrol S1 - "BORDER POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: Ciudad Juárez, a key Mexico–USA border city, is a major route for migrants seeking a better life. Mexican Federal Police special forces patrol the area to prevent illegal crossings and suspicious activity.

programme.title: ISLAND POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Police Patrol S1 - "ISLAND POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: To curb violence in Tananarive, Madagascar, a rapid-response police unit was formed. Meanwhile, a special team patrols Reunion Island nightly to keep security on this island paradise.

programme.title: The River Migration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "The River Migration"
programme.desc: The duo journeys downriver hunting Yukon Bull Moose, covering nearly 20 miles in two days. They establish moose camp despite an unsettling encounter with a nearby grizzly.

programme.title: Prayer Point
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point"
programme.desc: On day three at "Prayer Point", Casey faces another opportunity, inconveniently timed. While answering natures call, a bull respondes to cow calls from camp, appearing across the river.

programme.title: Night Stalkers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Night Stalkers"
programme.desc: Exhausted and famished, the brothers persist downstream, barely mustering energy to set camp. They find abundant signs of moose and favorable terrain for their habitat.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Anthony strives to prove himself as medical lead responding to a snowmobile crash on Togwotee Pass.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: The first priority of every mission is team safety, so when conditions on Pyramid Peak threaten Jake and Cody during a rescue, Tim demands they pump the breaks.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Jake and Marilynn cancel a dinner party so they can respond to an injured skier on Teton Pass.

programme.title: Under The Desert Sun
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Fight to Survive S3 - "Under The Desert Sun"
programme.desc: Ed Rosenthal set out for a short hike in Joshua Tree National Park, but in the heat of the day he became turned around and lost. His six-day ordeal of survival in blazing temperatures with no food or water is nothing short of miraculous.

programme.title: Tree Stand Nightmare
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Fight to Survive S3 - "Tree Stand Nightmare"
programme.desc: When avid bow hunter, Dr. Joe Baumgardner sets out to do routine maintenance on his tree stands, a twenty two foot fall leaves him with a severely broken leg and miles from help in the deep Mississippi woods.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1"
programme.desc: While solo climbing Mt. Goddard, a remote peak in the California Sierra, Gregg Hein’s leg is crushed by a boulder and he’s sent careening down the mountain. Barely able to stop his fall, he’s now faced with a horrific compound fracture.

programme.title: Driven in France
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "Driven in France"
programme.desc: Rich in abundance and history, the hills around Kayserberg, Alsace, are full of wildlife. Two friends set out to build a system to share that abundance with the rest of France, from forest to fork!

programme.title: Follow the Fallow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "Follow the Fallow"
programme.desc: After two years of anticipation, fallow deer can finally be hunted on new hunting grounds on top of the Italian Apennine mountains.

programme.title: Feathers and Fur
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "Feathers and Fur"
programme.desc: The wind is constantly blowing from the West on the island of Fanø in Denmark. Take the ferry to over, to hunt woodcock and rabbits with Jesper, his dog, and his ferret.

programme.title: Big Cities
programme.desc: Osaka, Japan, struggles with increasing emergency calls from its aging population. In fast-paced Greater Mexico City, home to 20 million people, medical services face overwhelming demand.

programme.title: National Day
programme.desc: In Israel, back-to-back Memorial and Independence Days put heavy demands on Magen David Adom. In Belgium, the July 21 national holiday draws over 200,000 people, triggering a surge in medical emergencies.

programme.title: Rising Waters
programme.desc: As Chris and Casey Keefer continue downriver, they rely more on fish, ducks, and berries as the moose rut approaches. An epic Alaskan rainstorm brings heavy repercussions for their success.

programme.title: All Eyes On Us
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Dropped S3 - "All Eyes On Us"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer fish for dinner and edge closer to extraction. However, another encounter with a grizzly jeopardizes their safety as the bear ventures too close to camp!

programme.title: Untouched Atols
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Untouched Atols"
programme.desc: Just off the coast of Africa is a strip of 115 islands called the Seychelles. Originally claimed by France in the 1700s most of the population speak French and the influence is felt in its cuisine.

programme.title: Heartbreak Tuna Capetown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Heartbreak Tuna Capetown"
programme.desc: When two oceans collide, there is mayhem on the horizon. On this episode Mario ventures off the coast of Cape Town where the Indian ocean meets the Atlantic.

programme.title: Getting Close to Black Death
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Getting Close to Black Death"
programme.desc: Deep in the wilderness of Northern South Africa, poaching is rife, and the wilderness is as dangerous as it gets. Mario attempts to be the first person in the area to have ever harvested one of the most dangerous animals known to Africa.

programme.title: Exploration Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Exploration Camp"
programme.desc: Days pass, moose elusive since Day 11. Restless nights with lurking creatures. They find an abandoned trappers cabin, home to a huge grizzly.

programme.title: Prayer Point 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point 2"
programme.desc: On the third day of river travel, the crew desperately seeks a hunting camp to lift morale and pursue the giant bull. Frustration mounts as the brothers confess uncertainty for the first time.

programme.title: King of the Tundra
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "King of the Tundra"
programme.desc: Casey downs a huge bull near the river. Another bull approaches, leading to a tense standoff across the river.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: The team battles high winds in the heli to save a snowmobiler with a busted femur.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Unprecedented three rescues in under twelve hours.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in new explosives technology.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2"
programme.desc: After his leg is crushed by a boulder, Gregg Hein is stranded on a high Sierra peak with an infected compound fracture. Knowing he won’t be reported missing for days, Gregg attempts to crawl off the mountain and rescue himself.

programme.title: Jamtland, Sweden
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Epic Trails S2 - "Jamtland, Sweden"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads 63 degrees north to Jamtland, Sweden, where he discovers a wild culture and breathtaking wilderness trails.

programme.title: Wales
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads to the UK to explore the rugged Wales Coast Path—an 870-mile hiking trail that offers stunning views and adventure along one of the most dramatic coastlines in the world.

programme.title: The Gift of Loyalty
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Loyalty"
programme.desc: Leon and Kindness One® earn their sea legs one last time traveling, via cargo ship, from Asia to Vancouver, where they are greeted by a majestic wilderness and a bitter cold front.

programme.title: The Gift of Gratitude
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Gratitude"
programme.desc: On the last leg of their 25K mile global adventure, Leon and Kindness One® travel down the Pacific Coast on their way to Hollywood. Reflections of his favorite moments inspire Leon to meet up again with the first person to show him kindness.

programme.title: Back to where it all started
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Roads End S1 - "Back to where it all started"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave are reaching the end of their incredible journey and must go back to where it all started Buenos Aires.

programme.title: 6000 km
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Roads End S1 - "6000 km"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave make a toast to their recently finished trip rough riding across Argentina.

programme.title: Russia
programme.desc: Jonathan faces his toughest challenge yet as he enters a country that has been coming to grips in defining and understanding their own cuisine. Through the historical turmoil and harsh climate, Russia has lost it’s traditional way of cooking, and eating. But the country is reviving this culture; Jonathan ventures the far stretches of the country to learn about modern cooks, as well as ancient kitchens housing the one key tool that gave birth to true Russian cuisine, the Russian oven. He’ll learn their insights, understand their efforts, and work with traditional Russian ingredients to learn what the cuisine used to be, and where it’s headed today.

programme.title: Mexico
programme.desc: Jonathan Legg is from California and he thinks he knows Mexican cuisine. This notion gets shattered as he experiences the onslaught of food in Mexico city! Between trying scorpion tacos and dodging shady markets in San Juan, he learns the dark art of sacred drinks, like pulque and mezcal, now turned into social libations. His journey also takes him to Oaxaca where he gets the low down on the fabled Mole sauce, and a long haul to a remote village reveals a secret ceremony that has origins of dark arts!

programme.title: The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein"
programme.desc: With one final trip ahead of them, Xander and his crew make their way from the scorching desert of Lindbergh to the haunted ghost town of Matjiesfontein.

programme.title: Finland
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Road Less Traveled S4 - "Finland"
programme.desc: Jonathan is in on a quest to uncover the Finnish psyche. What gives them their ultra calm demeanor? Murder mysteries, taxidermy centers, Argentinian tango to rally driving!

programme.title: Mexico Part 2
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Road Less Traveled S4 - "Mexico Part 2"
programme.desc: Jonathans Mexico adventure takes a new turn; the continuous pumping of Mexico’s lakes has caused not only a water shortage, but a seismic issue. He pinballs around the vast city to gain an understanding into this complex issue.

programme.title: The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Maximum Foodie S3 - "The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 1"
programme.desc: Sashi meets up with his good friend, Chef Ton, who has listed not only on Asias 50 Best, but also garnered a Michelin Star. Sashi gets an indepth insight into what it takes at running one of Thailands best known restaurants

programme.title: The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Maximum Foodie S3 - "The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 2"
programme.desc: Sashi continues his tour of Bangkok by rendezvousing with chefs. Rosarin from Celadon and David Tamburini from La Scala - 2 of Bangkoks well known eating establishments

programme.title: Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 Road Less Traveled S4 - "Cyprus"
programme.desc: Jonathan Legg hops on 2 wheels to explore the beautiful Mediterranean island of Cyprus. Being in the birthplace of Aphrodite, what better theme than to embark on a mission to find out what Cypriots consider beautiful.

programme.title: Arviat, Nunavut, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Arviat, Nunavut, Canada"
programme.desc: Heading to the far north into the Arctic to learn about the Inuit’s traditional culture and incredible way of life, the brothers accompany an elder and young hunter on a 200-mile skidoo hunt across the barren land and frozen sea ice.

programme.title: Kushtia, Bangladesh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Kushtia, Bangladesh"
programme.desc: The brothers traverse the country’s interconnecting network of waterways by ferryboat. From shrimp baron, to peasant fishermen, lofty temple ruins to anonymous chai wallahs, they make their way to Kushtia, home to the shrine of Guru Lalone Shaw.

programme.title: Kingdom of Mustang, Nepal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Kingdom of Mustang, Nepal"
programme.desc: Securing special visas, the brothers get 10 ponies and 6 porters and undertake a stunning, but difficult 13-day pony trek over the Himalayas to the valley of Mustang where they will try to have a sitting with the king.

programme.title: Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Epic Trails S2 - "Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson travels to the far eastern edge of North America to discover the beauty of Newfoundland and explore the stunning East Coast Trail.

programme.title: New South Wales, Australia
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Epic Trails S2 - "New South Wales, Australia"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads down under and puts his outdoor skills to the ultimate test as he challenges rugged mountain trails during spectacularly bad weather in New South Wales, Australia.

programme.title: California
programme.desc: Eric Hanson laces up his hiking boots to explore some of California’s most iconic wilderness, including Yosemite National Park, the Mojave Desert and Butte County.

programme.title: The Berg River
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Berg River"
programme.desc: While Xander gets an up-close look at the tranquil and isolated Kersefontein Farm, Adam becomes a true armchair adventurer, wishing he was experiencing anything besides snowy Canadian weather.

programme.title: The Majestic Cederberg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Majestic Cederberg"
programme.desc: When Adam’s power goes out in Winnipeg, he decides to spend the day building a snow fort. Meanwhile, Xander and his crew take a trip through Cederberg.

programme.title: From Elands to Lamberts Bay
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Elands to Lamberts Bay"
programme.desc: Up next, Xander and his team stop to surf the legendary left break at Elands Bay. After experiencing the peace and tranquility of the ocean with South African locals, Xander and his team hit a snag in their journey.

programme.title: The Gift of Faith
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Faith"
programme.desc: Leon and Kindness 2 leave sunny Los Angeles and head to freezing Alaska. With no money or food a Canadian bushman comes to the rescue.

programme.title: The Gift of Community
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Community"
programme.desc: Leon crashes and is stranded on the icy Yukon roads. He is invited to a party where one man opens his home to countless refugees.

programme.title: The Gift of Purpose
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Purpose"
programme.desc: After breaking down in Montana, Leon stays in a snowy wonderland. In Salt Lake City one woman’s passion to help others inspires his next gift.

programme.title: Nantes
programme.desc: Josh and ultimate traveler Lexie Limitless explore Nantes on a mechanical elephant and inline skates, and discover a deserted mine and a noble house.

programme.title: The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Maximum Foodie S3 - "The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 1"
programme.desc: Sashi meets up with his good friend, Chef Ton, who has listed not only on Asias 50 Best, but also garnered a Michelin Star. Sashi gets an indepth insight into what it takes at running one of Thailands best known restaurants

programme.title: The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Maximum Foodie S3 - "The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 2"
programme.desc: Sashi continues his tour of Bangkok by rendezvousing with chefs. Rosarin from Celadon and David Tamburini from La Scala - 2 of Bangkoks well known eating establishments

programme.title: Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 Road Less Traveled S4 - "Cyprus"
programme.desc: Jonathan Legg hops on 2 wheels to explore the beautiful Mediterranean island of Cyprus. Being in the birthplace of Aphrodite, what better theme than to embark on a mission to find out what Cypriots consider beautiful.

programme.title: Wild Paternoster
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Wild Paternoster"
programme.desc: Adam and Xander go on fishing trips on opposite sides of the globe; one in a winter wonderland and the other in Paternoster, an old South African fishing village.

programme.title: Kraalbaai Caribbean
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Kraalbaai Caribbean"
programme.desc: While Xander and his team experience the joys of wakeboarding in the beautiful Kraalbaai Caribbean, Adam attempts to replicate this experience.

programme.title: The Langeberg Mountains
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Langeberg Mountains"
programme.desc: The South African crew travels to the Langeberg Mountains for a luxurious day of relaxation and exploration while Adam searches for wildlife on his makeshift Canadian safari.

programme.title: Eggplant
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cooks on Fire S1 - "Eggplant"
programme.desc: Seven teams meet judges Ganesh Raj, Nici Wickes and Jared Macdonald in the BBQ arena. They make their signature barbecues and are challenged to cook with a mystery ingredient: the eggplant.

programme.title: Fast Food Barbecue
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Cooks on Fire S1 - "Fast Food Barbecue"
programme.desc: The six returning teams are asked to make a fast food barbecue in the Throwdown challenge, then the mystery Scorcher gives them something to be excited about: venison.

programme.title: Fusion Feast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Cooks on Fire S1 - "Fusion Feast"
programme.desc: The five remaining teams are challenged to create a fusion feast in the Throwdown challenge, then a dessert in the mystery Scorcher.

programme.title: Argentina
programme.desc: Two talented Canadian brothers and pro MTB riders decide to go on a freeride trip together and choose to explore the remote desert of Argentina.

programme.title: South Africa
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 MTB Heroes S3 - "South Africa"
programme.desc: We follow the fastest and most stylish female MTB pro rider in the world during a trip to South Africa where she will ride the best trails around Cape Town.

programme.title: Judgement Day
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Judgement Day"
programme.desc: Tony and Cindy DAgostino visit the Ghouls. Mark and Tony geek out over the 1970 Superbee 383 Magnum and the 1971 Plymouth Roadrunner.

programme.title: Cuda ‘Tat
programme.desc: Mark and Allysa decode the broadcast sheet for a 1970 Challenger. Will breaks a part on the Cuda and Mark painstakingly examines his paint job.

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Road Less Traveled S4 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: Jonathan Legg is in Asia’s world city, Hong Kong! With all things opulent and luxurious; high end art collectors to the priciest wines in the world, super car aficionados and helicopter getaways from skyscraper rooftops; this is the road less traveled from a different point of view.

programme.title: Ridermania
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Roads Unknown India S1 - "Ridermania"
programme.desc: After a crash leaves Zombie injured, the crew scrambles to stay on schedule for Ridermania. Jess arrives at the festival, participates in events and is met with overwhelming support from fans and fellow riders. The three-day celebration ends with a visit to a famous Goa beach before the crew heads to Ganpatipule.

programme.title: Bikes and Boats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Roads Unknown India S1 - "Bikes and Boats"
programme.desc: Jess and her ride crew navigate the stunning but rugged Konkan Coast, switching between bikes and boats while juggling luggage, riders and a lost phone. Gearshifter unexpectedly joins the team as they race toward Mumbai, determined to get Pulak to the city in time to visit his family.

programme.title: WILD BOAR IN HEREKINO
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "WILD BOAR IN HEREKINO"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri is in Herekino where he meets local characters, brothers, Chad and Theo who take him on an epic pig hunting adventure.

programme.title: DIVING FOR KINA AT RANGIPUTA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "DIVING FOR KINA AT RANGIPUTA"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri Weeps heads North to Rangiputa. Guided by locals Wikatana and Sandy, the trio hit the water for a kina dive. Plus Piri gains some insight on a rahui established in Ahipara.

programme.title: The Feast on the East
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Maximum Foodie S2 - "The Feast on the East"
programme.desc: The India foodie excursion continues. This time, Sashi is in the eastern fringe of India. Revelling in the colonial splendor of Kolkata, exploring bustling fish markets and a unique story of India’s only Chinatown. Sashi then tracks down south to Orissa where he comes across a once in a lifetime opportunity and access to Puri’s Jagannath temple’s maha bhog; the massive effort of religious food offerings made daily to Lord Jagannath, one of the world’s largest kitchen operations that feed over 100,000 people every single day! Following recipes and ingredients that have been unchanged for millenia - a stark contrast to the previous episode showcasing Masque and their cutting edge...

programme.title: Bali - The Hidden Side part 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Maximum Foodie S2 - "Bali - The Hidden Side part 1"
programme.desc: Indonesia is home to thousands of islands and exotic ingredients. But the most famous one is without a doubt, Bali. Known as a respite for travelers seeking health retreats, luxury villas, and lush tropical getaway experiences, Bali is without a doubt one of the most frequented island destinations. But there is a hidden side to it that is seeded in culture, mystery and traces of the grand splendor of Bali’s ancient kingdom legacy. To help him explore this, Sashi meets up with Reynaldo De Luna, the executive chef at the legendary Amandari. With Rey’s guidance, Sashi gets a first hand look at ancient temple ceremonies, foraging in the true wilds of Bali seeking out cashew, cloves, vanilla,...

programme.title: Aurelie Gonin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Capturing Winter S1 - "Aurelie Gonin"
programme.desc: Aurelie Gonin is one of the few women working in winter action sports filmmaking. Over the years she gathered expertise in every aspect of her field. We join as she directs an elite ski and snowboarding qualification event of the Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: Philippines
programme.desc: This Luxe Travels episode explores one of Philippines 7000+ islands, and this particular island is voted by most travel publications to be the most beautiful in the world. We are of course talking about the island of Palawan.

programme.title: California
programme.desc: A unique episode in it’s own right, this episode features a road trip through California, Luxe Travels style; however, the focus this time around is not necessarily on luxury, it’s more about adventures and explorations on the road. Host Sophie Ashley tours around the Golden State, making stops in iconic destinations like San Francisco, Los Angeles, Monterey, and Santa Barbara. Her ride for the episode, true to the Island Hunter style is the iconic Aston Martin DB11 Volante

programme.title: Cape Verde
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Cape Verde"
programme.desc: An expat fisherman scores a big catch in Cape Verde, while another struggles in Spain. A French BandB receives its first review, and a boutique hotel launches a wedding business.

programme.title: Boutique Wedding
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Boutique Wedding"
programme.desc: Steve and his mother-in-law serve food at their Spanish bar. Ray and Yvonne host a wedding at their hotel. Two ex-actors try to bring drama to Bordeaux amid a new baby’s arrival.

programme.title: JERSEY and ITALY
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Travel in Style S2 - "JERSEY and ITALY"
programme.desc: Nestled some 12 miles off Normandy France lays the beautiful channel Island of Jersey. Part two we fly across to Portofino in Italy.

programme.title: SCOTLAND and SWITZERLAND
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Travel in Style S2 - "SCOTLAND and SWITZERLAND"
programme.desc: It’s a royal theme in part one as we stay in the royal mile of Edinburgh in Scotland in the famous Balmoral Hotel now owned by Rocco Forte. In Switzerland we discover the lake based city of Geneva with its famous landmark the Jet d’Eau.

programme.title: FRANCE
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Travel in Style S2 - "FRANCE"
programme.desc: In Paris we visit Hotel le Meurice and Hotel Plaza Athenee, then head down south to sunny Cannes and stay in the Carlton made famous of course by Elton John.

programme.title: Old and New Delhi…A City of Contrasts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Journeys in India S1 - "Old and New Delhi…A City of Contrasts"
programme.desc: We explore the capital of India. The bustling metropolis is filled with modern skyscrapers that stand side-by-side with hundreds of ancient monuments, making Delhi a physical dichotomy of yesterday and tomorrow.

programme.title: Great Caves of Ajanta and Ellora
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Journeys in India S2 - "Great Caves of Ajanta and Ellora"
programme.desc: The Hindu, Buddhist and Jain caves in these two UNESCO sites contain some of the most beautiful carvings and paintings found in Asia. This episode explores the history and relationship between these religions.

programme.title: Jodhpur: India’s Queen of the Desert
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Journeys in India S2 - "Jodhpur: India’s Queen of the Desert"
programme.desc: No city in the Great Thar Desert of West India has had the sway that Jodhpur has. Giant forts, impressive palaces and a legendary royal hero that frees his people from tyrannical outsiders all make this a fascinating historic romp.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Bucket List"
programme.desc: Mike’s friend invites him to an Indian wedding and tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. This client is looking for an investment property and a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Right Choice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Right Choice"
programme.desc: Daryl and Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found and Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl’s client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land and nature.

programme.title: Big City Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Big City Home"
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil and has always wanted to skydive with her clients.

programme.title: Dream Homes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 House Hunt S1 - "Dream Homes"
programme.desc: Lovebirds Jess and Simon need help from their parents to buy a home on Auckland’s North Shore and Queenstown couple Will and Grace prepare to go to auction on their dream home.

programme.title: Newlyweds
programme.desc: Newly wed immigrants Sam and Maria get some inside info from a real estate agent as they search for a home for their future family.. and in Auckland, North Shore duo Jess and Simon prepare to go to auction on their dream home, but will their budget of $615,000 be enough?

programme.title: Family Affair
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 House Hunt S1 - "Family Affair"
programme.desc: Siblings Courtney and Tom join forces with their partners and younger sister Natalie to buy their first home in Auckland, but can they find a place big enough to make their dreams of communal living a reality? And in Wellington will visa delays put an end to Sam and Maria’s dreams of home ownership?

programme.title: Philippines/ Maldives Special
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Luxe Travels S1 - "Philippines/ Maldives Special"
programme.desc: Elise Ducan showcases Philippines best resorts in El Nido Palawan; to continue on the theme of luxury travel, she heads to Maldives to explore 2 of the finest properties there; Shangri La and COMO Maalifushi

programme.title: Ice Hotel, Sweden - Bangkok
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Ice Hotel, Sweden - Bangkok"
programme.desc: From the hustle and bustle of Bangkok to the freezing temperatures of the Ice Hotel in Sweden, this episode is all about polar opposites, fire and ice.

programme.title: St Tropez - St Lucia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "St Tropez - St Lucia"
programme.desc: Romantic Caribbean Islands and sleeping fishing villages turned European jet set resorts, this episode travels from St Lucia to St Tropez.

programme.title: Ulagala, Sri Lanka - Florence
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Ulagala, Sri Lanka - Florence"
programme.desc: From Michael Angelo’s David in Florence to elephant safaris in Sri Lanka, this is an art lovers and outdoorsy adventure.

programme.title: ITALY and FRANCE
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Travel in Style S2 - "ITALY and FRANCE"
programme.desc: This time we visit Milan the home of fashion. In part two we are all at sea, well more on river to be truthful in beautiful Burgandy in the wine region of France.

programme.title: CAPE TOWN and BLUE MOUNTAINS
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Travel in Style S2 - "CAPE TOWN and BLUE MOUNTAINS"
programme.desc: In the episode we visit the Mother City of South Africa – Cape Town. The second half of the show is based in the distinctive blue haze of the Blue Mountains, Australia.

programme.title: BANGKOK and NEW YORK
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Travel in Style S2 - "BANGKOK and NEW YORK"
programme.desc: We visit floating Markets, Royal Palaces and the new spa and sauna of the Peninsula Hotel in Bangkok. Then it’s off to the city thats so good they named it twice… New York!

programme.title: Coastal Paradise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Australias Amazing Homes S1 - "Coastal Paradise"
programme.desc: Australia is universally known for its sun and its stunning beaches. Johanna and Pete visit some very special coastal retreats that not only have gorgeous architecture but set benchmarks for environmental design.

programme.title: City Dreams
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "City Dreams"
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez’s client is selling their separate properties and looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc.

programme.title: Cottage Getaways
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Cottage Getaways"
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike’s client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land and privacy.

programme.title: Desert Holiday
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Desert Holiday"
programme.desc: A London family relocates to run a gite in rural France. Two friends compete to open a Spanish seafront bar and Expats test a holiday complex in the Spanish desert.

programme.title: Budget for a Dream
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 House Hunt S1 - "Budget for a Dream"
programme.desc: In Auckland, Siblings Courtney and Tom joined forces with their partners and younger sister Natalie to buy their first home in Auckland..but will Natalie’s change of heart put an end to their dreams of communal living? And in Hastings can childhood sweethearts Joe and Maria find a home for $240,000?

programme.title: Challenges
programme.desc: Still reeling from the blow to their budget, can Hastings couple Joe and Maria regroup and find a home? And in Wellington Americans Bonnie and Matt want a warm, dry home for their family and they’ve come up with a bold plan…

programme.title: Race for the Place
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 House Hunt S1 - "Race for the Place"
programme.desc: Will Bonnie and Matt’s dreams of prefab living come true or will it all come crashing down? And in Hamilton, animal lovers Monique and Chris need to find their first home in a hurry…

programme.title: Lisbon V Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Jet Set S1 - "Lisbon V Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos)"
programme.desc: In the penultimate episode Richard remains in the Turks and Caicos Islands, only this time he’s visiting the exclusive island resort of Parrot Cay. While Gill’s combining a city and beach break in the Portuguese capital of Lisbon.

programme.title: Coastal Paradise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Australias Amazing Homes S1 - "Coastal Paradise"
programme.desc: Australia is universally known for its sun and its stunning beaches. Johanna and Pete visit some very special coastal retreats that not only have gorgeous architecture but set benchmarks for environmental design.

programme.title: Algarve and Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos Islands)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Algarve and Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos Islands)"
programme.desc: From miles of soft golden sand in Portugal’s Algarve region, to the miles of sand that surrounds Parrot Cay Island in the Turks and Caicos, this is a beach lover’s episode.

programme.title: Copenhagen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Running the World S1 - "Copenhagen"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Copenhagen to meet up with a local free runner and undertake an epic run of Tivoli Gardens.

programme.title: Desert Holiday
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Desert Holiday"
programme.desc: A London family relocates to run a gite in rural France. Two friends compete to open a Spanish seafront bar and Expats test a holiday complex in the Spanish desert.

programme.title: Big Wave World Tour
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Big Wave World Tour"
programme.desc: Trevor Carlson puts everything on the line to chase monster waves from Maui, Hawaii to Ensenada, Mexico.

programme.title: Skimboarding Jaws
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Skimboarding Jaws"
programme.desc: Brad Domke aims for the big wave surfing history books by skimming the big waves of Pe’ahi.

programme.title: LA County
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 A Simple Path S3 - "LA County"
programme.desc: Yann explores LA County skateboard communities, visiting Gunters handmade leather goods workshop, Open Gallery, Justins recycled skateboard wood shop, Tito from Local Hearts Foundation, and Eunice a vlogger, emphasizing community and creativity.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 A Simple Path S3 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Yann explores Los Angeles, visiting Kingswell Skate Shop, meeting DJ Chavez and Norman Woods. He encounters DiOrr Greenwoods artistic skateboards, Hali Stradas fashion and Chandler Burtons unique project merging drag, puppets and skating.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Street Art Challenge S1 - "London"
programme.desc: Two legendary street artists team up in London for the ultimate Street Art Challenge. Things get out of hand between the two as it turns into a street fight.

programme.title: Trust Me!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Trust Me!"
programme.desc: Jason has attempted to climb the Grand Teton, located in Wyoming, three times before the couples adventure out west. Will the fourth time be a charm, or will lifes unplanned moments present even greater challenges than Jason anticipated?

programme.title: Hells Revenge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Hells Revenge"
programme.desc: After climbing the Grand Teton, the couple head to Utah where a change of plans has them trading in their climbing shoes for an ATV. They take on Hells Revenge, a 4x4 trail only recommended for extremely experienced drivers...which they are not.

programme.title: Deserts and Mountain Lions. Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Deserts and Mountain Lions. Oh My!"
programme.desc: Hiking and canyoneering are a nice break from strenuous mountaineering, but its hard to relax when a lack of water and mountain lions are part of the equation. Tayler and Jason both need a break...but is the break they need actually from each other?

programme.title: Riding Waves in Stilbaai
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Riding Waves in Stilbaai"
programme.desc: In Stilbaai, Xander and his crew partake in a peaceful shammanic practice before embarking on an intimidating adventure. Back in Canada, Adam learns a lesson about moderation.

programme.title: From Mosselbay to Pinnacle Point
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Mosselbay to Pinnacle Point"
programme.desc: As Xander travels from Mosselbay to Pinnacle Point, he and his team encounter a beautiful ziplining course, the best golfing in all of South Africa, and an all inclusive spa day.

programme.title: Ancient forests of Tsitsikamma
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Ancient forests of Tsitsikamma"
programme.desc: Xander takes full advantage of the opportunities given to him by experiencing all that Tsitsikamma has to offer, whether that be bungee jumping, quad biking, or visiting a 60’s diner.

programme.title: Edinburgh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Access All Areas S1 - "Edinburgh"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando uncovers Edinburghs gruesome past, back when grave robbing, bodysnatching and murder were rife.

programme.title: Cornwall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Access All Areas S1 - "Cornwall"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando dives into life in Cornwall to discover the ancient practices of witchcraft and smuggling.

programme.title: Iceland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Access All Areas S1 - "Iceland"
programme.desc: Francesca is on a quest to discover why Icelandic people believe in mythical creatures. Is it folk law or are there really trolls lurking in the wilderness?

programme.title: The Best of…
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "The Best of…"
programme.desc: In the episode you can see the best of Around the World in 80 Tricks.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "TROUT FISHING THE TONGARIRO"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri heads to Turangi to go fly fishing on upper reaches of the Tongariro River only accessible by white water rafting.

programme.title: KINA CREW

programme.title: WILD RAM + WEKA

programme.desc: In this episode, Piri is in the Chatham Islands hunting wild ram and weka with one of the locals known as Big Jase.

programme.title: Deepaks India
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Car and Country Quest S1 - "Deepaks India"
programme.desc: Deepak, Ashique, and Freddie explore South Kerala. They experience Kalaripayattu martial arts, ride Royal Enfields through scenic landscapes, enjoy a jungle cruise, taste local toddy and cuisine, and compete in a thrilling snake boat race.

programme.title: Ashiques India
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Car and Country Quest S1 - "Ashiques India"
programme.desc: Ashique leads an adventure through North Kerala, driving Ferraris and Lamborghinis, as well as experiencing a fascinating train ride across the Indian region. The trio enjoys wildlife, a market visit, a mountain camping trip, a night safari, traditional dance, and a thrilling race.

programme.title: Deepaks Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Car and Country Quest S1 - "Deepaks Italy"
programme.desc: The trio experience gladiator combat, drive classic cars through the countryside, and learn winemaking in Barolo. The adventure also includes motocross thrills, blending history, culture, and excitement throughout northern Italy.

programme.title: Chile, Thailand and Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Chile, Thailand and Japan"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris gets lost in one of Chile’s best kept secrets, encounters some not so friendly locals in Thailand, steps back in time to master the ‘middle ages’ and finds out what the future of nightlife looks like in technological Tokyo.

programme.title: Vanuatu, Australia Alps and Abu Dhabi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Vanuatu, Australia Alps and Abu Dhabi"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris comes face to face with a live volcano in Vanuatu, meets up with a team of Huskies in the Australian Alps and takes them for a spin! Later, Chris explores the bustling Middle Eastern Metropolis of Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Japan and Australian Sea Safari
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Japan and Australian Sea Safari"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris visits the world’s coolest monkeys in Japan, seeks out the Big 5 creatures of the deep on an Australian Sea Safari and takes us on a tour of his Australian home.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Running the World S1 - "London"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to London where they are challenged to create a run in the Olympic Park.

programme.title: Paris
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Running the World S1 - "Paris"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to France where they are challenged to create a run in historic Lisses.

programme.title: Croatia

programme.title: San Juan to Laguna Brava
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Roads End S1 - "San Juan to Laguna Brava"

programme.title: Salt Flats

programme.desc: Rob and Dave are continuing on through the stunning scenery of Laguna Brava towards Corona del Inca. That’s not all they’ve got in store though.

programme.title: Abandoned Village

programme.desc: Rob and Dave embrace their adventurous sides when they abandon the plan to take the safe route and instead take on what could be their most challenging riding.

programme.title: Snowdonia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Access All Areas S1 - "Snowdonia"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando goes on a high-octane, nail-biting adventure in Snowdonia, one of the remotest corners of the UK.

programme.title: Sahara

programme.title: Perfect Neighbourhood

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Home Sweet Home"
programme.desc: Now that Kristen and Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver and want somewhere of their own to stay in.

programme.title: Bali - The Hidden Side part 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Maximum Foodie S2 - "Bali - The Hidden Side part 2"
programme.desc: Indonesia is home to thousands of islands and exotic ingredients. But the most famous one is without a doubt, Bali. Known as a respite for travelers seeking health retreats, luxury villas, and lush tropical getaway experiences, Bali is without a doubt one of the most frequented island destinations. But there is a hidden side to it that is seeded in culture, mystery and traces of the grand splendor of Bali’s ancient kingdom legacy. To help him explore this, Sashi meets up with Reynaldo De Luna, the executive chef at the legendary Amandari. With Rey’s guidance, Sashi gets a first hand look at ancient temple ceremonies, foraging in the true wilds of Bali seeking out cashew, cloves, vanilla,...

programme.title: The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Maximum Foodie S3 - "The Best Chefs of Modern Bangkok Part 1"
programme.desc: Sashi meets up with his good friend, Chef Ton, who has listed not only on Asias 50 Best, but also garnered a Michelin Star. Sashi gets an indepth insight into what it takes at running one of Thailands best known restaurants

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Boisterous inmates are placed in restraints after initiating several verbal altercations. A woman struggles with substance abuse following the death of her fianc̩, and two young escorts discuss their "observing" strategy when casino hopping.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman refuses to wear jail-issued clothing. A man tells his tearful tale to officers, and a chatty inebriated woman is placed in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT an inebriated man gets aggressive and questions why hes in custody. In Sarasota, FL a couple are taken in for assaulting a bartender. In Portland, OR a man is placed in custody for harassing movie theater security guards. In Las Vegas, NV a chauffeur is placed in custody for amassing a number of of moving violations.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed in isolation after disparaging other inmates. Alarms blare while a fight erupts in the shower room among inmates. A man booked into jail is revealed to have a 20-year arrest record.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is sent to intake for indecent exposure. In Spokane, WA a man threatening bodily harm to himself is placed in a restraining chair. In Salt Lake City, UT an intoxicated woman fades in and out of coherency. In Portland, OR an amputee is detained for dodging the subway toll.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tequila is to blame when a mans behavior gets him locked up. A woman tries to sell drugs online. A detainee in holding for a DUI is of the opinion that he’s been jailed for driving too slow.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E17 Gone to the Dogs
programme.desc: Officers find hidden drugs on a burglary suspect during a pat down that leads to a tense confrontation. A beer sets off a fight between a mom and her daughter causing one family member to end up in jail. A rare event takes place in the county jail - a woman arrested for a warrant is in a good mood. Punching a pit bull while drunk lands in man in jail where he comes face to face with a childhood hero.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E19 A Night of Fights
programme.desc: A man tries to swallow his ring. A heroin addict wants help when he realizes his habit has cost him everything he loves. One man fights with his girlfriend in a bathroom, another fights with his girlfriend at home, both are surprised they are arrested for domestic violence. A habitual criminal is worried that other inmates will fight over him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is charged with possession of an illegal substance. Police arrest a woman for narcotics, and a couple is caught passing a fake prescription.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman stalking David Copperfield is arrested. An inebriated inmate voices her displeasure with the guards, and a man nabbed for driving under the influence of prescription drugs howls for his dog.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is arrested at a popular theme park for public intoxication. A detainee swallows his earring during processing. Officers attempt to restrain a combative woman in custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the “international police”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A Batman impressionist is arrested after punching Chewbacca. A broken arm doesn’t stop a woman from struggling with officers. A man finds out it’s better to pay the fine then do the time. A woman involved in an affair with an older gentleman claims she was set up.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies deal with chaos after volatile inmates begin fighting. Accusations of deceit plague a booking as a woman is arrested for drunk driving. Prisoners are restrained after causing a commotion.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmates flirting calms a jailhouse fight. An inebriated man tries to avoid his eighth DUI by claiming his car was stolen, and a disagreement over Faecbook puts a couple in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A transient man tries to resist the officers in booking then serenades them with a song. A difficult inmate blames his behavior on various medical conditions, and a woman claims to be Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man claims to be connected to the occupy Wall Street movement. Officers struggle with a combative man, and a tearful candy thief is taken into custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Prositutes discuss their risqu̩ occupation and explain their fees. An intoxicated woman doesnt want her blood drawn, and two shoplifters face the potential consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A singer in custody performs for the officers. A woman is charged with burglary, and officers see right through a young womans tears.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in womens lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail

A woman arrested for selling fake designer purses as real ones says she didn’t know it was a crime.
