programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A drug dealers mean-spirited girlfriend lands herself in isolation. The police deal with an inebriated man accused of throwing rocks, and guards attempt to defuse a situation involving battling cellmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: Kuukauden tyontekija (Employee of the Month)
programme.desc: Kaksi aarimmaisen kilpailunhaluista tukkukaupan tyontekijaa kilpailee ”Kuukauden tyontekija” -tittelista ja siita, kumpi voittaa kuuman uuden kassanhoitajan sydamen tassa hulvattomassa komediassa.

programme.title: Sinun, minun ja meidan (Yours, Mine and Ours)
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid ja Rene Russo tahdittavat tata ihastuttavaa uudelleenfilmatisointia vuoden 1968 samannimisesta elokuvasta. Leskeksi jaanyt rannikkovartioston amiraali ja leskeksi jaanyt kasilaukkujen suunnittelija rakastuvat ja menevat naimisiin, mika aiheuttaa suurta harmia hanen 10 ja hanen 8 lapselleen. Lasten juonitellessa vanhempiensa erottamiseksi he tajuavat, etta tarkeinta on perhe.

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Growing Up and Other Lies
programme.desc: Vuosia taiteilijana New Yorkissa riutunut Jake aikoo palata kotiin Ohioon. Viimeisena paivanaan kaupungissa han kutsuu kolme vanhinta ystavaansa mukaan nostalgiselle kavelyretkelle Manhattanin paasta paahan. Yritys palata huolettomaan nuoruuteen ei suju ihan toiveiden mukaisesti. Vanhat ongelmat nousevat pintaan paivan mittaan, kun Jake sotkeutuu ex-tyttoystavaansa ja kaverit kamppailevat omien miehisyyskriisiensa kanssa.

programme.title: The People We Hate at the Wedding
programme.desc: Tassa hulvattoman rohkeassa komediassa disfunktioiset amerikkalaiset sisarukset Alice ja Paul – yhdessa aina optimistisen aitinsa kanssa – kutsutaan brittilaisiin haihin, joissa heidan etainen puolisisarensa Eloise menee naimisiin. Se on tilaisuus heille yhdistya uudelleen – enemman tai vahemman – aikuisina ja oppia rakastamaan toisiaan kuten ennen.

programme.title: Amateur Night
programme.desc: Jason Biggs esittaa Guyta, palkittua, vasta valmistunutta arkkitehtia. Nyt han on kuitenkin tyoton, tuleva isa, joka etsii epatoivoisesti toita. Vaimonsa vaatimuksesta Guy vastaa netti-ilmoitukseen, jossa etsitaan ”kuljettajaa”. Guy kuvittelee toimittavansa pizzoja, mutta han huomaakin olevansa nykyaikainen sutenoori - han toimii kuskina ja sihteerina ilotytoille. Han tarvitsee rahaa, joten han tapaa Nikkin, piinkovan ja armottoman seksityontekijan, ja Nikin kaksi hulvatonta ja raavasuista kollegaa, Jaxin ja Fallonin. Guy, tuo vastentahtoinen kuski ja turvamies, paatyy rokkaavien naisten ja ressukoitten miesten maailmaan. Hurjan ja villin yon aikana, monen lahelta piti -tilanteen jalkeen,

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Kate antaa 30-vuotispaivan aattonaan Evielle ja Charlielle luvan jarjestaa itselleen pirskeet. Juhlista sukeutuu kuitenkin menneisyytta ja nykyisyytta sekoitteleva villi peli, ja tilanne riistaytyy kaikkien kasista.

programme.title: Sinun, minun ja meidan (Yours, Mine and Ours)
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid ja Rene Russo tahdittavat tata ihastuttavaa uudelleenfilmatisointia vuoden 1968 samannimisesta elokuvasta. Leskeksi jaanyt rannikkovartioston amiraali ja leskeksi jaanyt kasilaukkujen suunnittelija rakastuvat ja menevat naimisiin, mika aiheuttaa suurta harmia hanen 10 ja hanen 8 lapselleen. Lasten juonitellessa vanhempiensa erottamiseksi he tajuavat, etta tarkeinta on perhe.

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Maybe Baby
programme.desc: Komedia pariskunnasta (Hugh Laurie ja Joely Richardson), jotka yrittavat saada lasta.

programme.title: Happy-Go-Lucky
programme.desc: Opettaja Poppy selviytyy optimisminsa turvin elaman pienista vastoinkaymisista ja levittaa ymparilleen iloa ja naurua.

programme.title: Kuuhullut (Moonstruck)
programme.desc: Tassa klassisessa romanttisessa komediassa Brooklynin leski (Cher) on valmis menemaan uudelleen naimisiin. Talla kertaa han aikoo tehda sen oikein, vaikka joutuisikin sanomaan ”kylla” miehelle, jota han ei oikeasti rakasta. Mutta kun han rakastuu sulhasensa veljeen (Nicolas Cage), seuraa romanttinen mutka, joka on arvoinen suurimpia koomisia oopperoita! Olympia Dukakis on myos mukana.

programme.title: Single Moms Club
programme.desc: Erilaisista taustoista tulevat sinkkuaidit yhdistavat voimansa ja perustavat itselleen tukiryhman keskustellakseen ongelmistaan, loytaakseen huumoria vastoinkaymisista ja hyodyntaakseen sisaista voimaansa henkilokohtaisten haasteidensa voittamiseksi.

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: Joukko Star Wars -faneja matkustaa Skywalker Ranchille varastaakseen kopion elokuvasta "The Phantom Menace," jotta heidan kuolemansairas ystavansa ehtisi nahda sen ennen sen ensi-iltaa, joka on vasta usean kuukauden paasta.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube, Anthony Anderson, Sean Patrick Thomas, Eve ja Cedric the Entertainer tahdittavat tata hervotonta komediaa Chicagon parturiliikkeesta, jossa terava huumori ei koskaan mene pois muodista! Calvin (Ice Cube) on yrittajaksi pyrkiva nuori mies suurilla suunnitelmilla... eika perheen parturiliikkeen pyorittaminen kuulu niihin. Mutta kun han myy impulsiivisesti liikkeen epailyttavalle lainanantajalle, han tajuaa pian, kuinka tarkea naapuruston parturi on hanelle... ja kuinka pitkalle han on valmis menemaan saadakseen sen takaisin!

programme.title: Nimeni on Nobody
programme.desc: Villia lantta kierteleva Nobody on eraanlainen palkkasoturi. Han tarjoaa nopeaa ja kuolettavan taitavaa aseenkasittelytaitoaan niille, jotka siita tarpeeksi maksavat. Nobody palkataan etsimaan legendaarinen asesankari Jack Beauregard, jota nopeampaa lansi ei viela ole tuntenut. Nobodyn loydettya Beauregardin, on miesten toisiaan kohtaan tuntema kunnioitus ilmeinen, ja heista tulee vahitellen ystavia. Mutta Beauregard tuntee, ettei lansi ole enaa entisensa, ja etta myos hanen aikansa alkaa olla ohitse...

programme.title: A Haunted House 2
programme.desc: Tassa hulvattomassa jatko-osassa Marlon Wayans palaa Malcolmina, joka saatuaan entisen demoninsa karkotettua aloittaa uuden elaman uuden tyttoystavansa ja taman kahden lapsen kanssa. Muutettuaan unelmakotiinsa Malcolmia vaivaavat jalleen oudot paranormaalit tapahtumat, eika talla kertaa vain talo ole kummitusten asuttama! Jamie Pressly, Cedric the Entertainer ja Essence Atkins ovat myos mukana.

programme.title: The Beach Bum
programme.desc: The Beach Bum seuraa loppuun palaneen Moondogin (Matthew McConaughey) hillittomia epaonnenkolauksia hanen toimiessaan vain omien pelisaantojensa mukaan. Huikea tahtikaarti -Snoop Dogg, Isla Fisher, Zac Efron, Jimmy Buffett, Martin Lawrence ja Jonah Hill - takaa villin menon kumouksellissa uutuuskomediassa, jonka tarjoilee kasikirjoittaja-ohjaaja Harmony Korine.

programme.title: Weird: The Al Yankovic Story
programme.desc: Daniel Radcliffe (The Lost City, Swiss Army Man, Harry Potter -elokuvat) on “Weird Al” Yankovic liioittelemattomassa tositarinassa aikamme suurimmasta muusikosta ja seksisymbolista. Elokuvassa nayttelevat myos Evan Rachel Wood (Westworld, Across the Universe) Madonnana seka Rainn Wilson (Konttori, Megalodon) Dr. Dementona.

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An unholy alliance! Marking the feature film debut of one of Hollywoods most influential and widely referenced auteur directors, Sam Peckinpah, The Deadly Companions centers on a redemptive journey to escort a funeral procession through dangerous Indian Territory. Featuring fine work from a top-notch cast that includes the inimitable Maureen OHara at the height of her illustrious career, Peckinpahs first foray into film provides a promising glance into the energetic and violent nature of his iconic later works.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: Call of the Forest
programme.desc: Theres plenty of drama in this tale of lost gold mines, gallant stallions, and fuzzy bears. Starring Ken Curtis, Robert Lowery, and Chief Thundercloud, this charming little film is highlighted by Karl Struss stunning photography

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Revenge of the Virgins (Edited Version)
programme.desc: The angry and topless female members of a Native American prepare for battle when white treasure hunters move in on their sacred ground. Peter Perry Jr. (The Secret Sex Lives of Romeo and Juliet) directed this early nudie-cutie from a script by legendary cult filmmaker Ed Wood (Plan Nine from Outer Space). Writing under the pen name Peter LaRoche, Wood churned out this screenplay just before he reinvented himself as the author of seedy adult novels.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In this episode, the scourge of the Southwest is a ruthless and devious killer known as the Sidewinder. When a hapless Cavalryman escorting the criminal falls victim to his tricks, Pat and Sonny set out to track him down and bring him in. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. This episode, Stolen Dynamite, stars Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-men nab a beautiful spy.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but hes not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie finds herself caught in the middle of a train heist led by the Sam Bass gang.In order to get to Sam, she pretends to be a waitress and flirts with one of his henchmen. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955..Directed by William Witney. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Don Haggerty plays Sam Bass, while Denver Pyle is his henchman, Bill Hayes.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a detective who faces the notorious gunslinger Johnny Ringo after finding him responsible for a train robbery. Directed by William Witney. Also starring Mary Castle. Donald Curtis, Emlen Davis, Lee Roberts, Harry Lauter, and Ralph Sanford. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired March 4, 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, one of Judge Beans friends is forced to translate a map by two outlaws. They stole the item from Chinese miners and the Judge must save his pal without endangering his life. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West.In this episode, Judge Bean suspects that Doc Malones Medicine Show may be harboring a notorious killer. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Dave Morgan, an honest lawyer, faces off with Carter Holmes, a crooked politician, in a fiery election campaign. Things take a turn for the worse when Holmes attempts to have his opponent killed. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Looking through an old trunk, Tagg and his friend Johnny Ward, the son of a murdered lawman, find proof that his uncle is an ex-convict and may be involved in a recent bank robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A man returns home to find that his family has been murdered in a Huron raid.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye goes up against a crew of pirates when they kidnap two women.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright unknowingly hires outlaw Johnny Logan to help him with his cattle drive. Logan, going by the name Sam Jackson, joined with a plan to kill the sheriff of a nearby town.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Under Western Stars
programme.desc: Roy Rogers debuts in his starring role as the likable cowboy sent to Congress with a mission: let Washington know about the suffering of farmers in the wake of Americas 1930s Dustbowl. Enjoy the singing cowboy in his first starring role, rubbing shoulder with politians, going up against greedy executives, and representing a whole people group youll see why Rogers became a national icon! Frog Millhouse: Smiley Burnett. Elanore Fairbanks: Carol Hughes. John Fairbanks: Guy Usher. Plus music and singing from the Maple City Four. (The song Dust was nominated for an Academy Award!) Directed by Joe Kane.

programme.title: Bells of San Angelo
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Dale Evans team up in this tale of silver mines, kidnappings, and secret passages. Roy plays a border guard who has to rescue Dale from the clutches of underhanded miner Rex Gridley (John McGuire). How does he do it? With help from Trigger, of course! With a cast that inclues Andy Devine as Sheriff Cookie Bullfincer, director William Witney gives us an enjoyable drama from the golden era of Republic Pictures!

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywoods fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boones daughter. Theres plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isnt how you die, Boone says. Its what you live for.

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: His Wits, Weapons and Women, Turned Defeat Into Victory! A man brings a wagonload of Kentucky rifles through Indian Territory. Unfortunately the Indians realize what he has and offer the travelers an ultimatum: the rifles or their lives! Starring Lance Fuller, Sterling Holloway, Henry Hull, Chill Wills, Cathy Downs, and Jeanne Cagney, plus one of the great B-Western heels, I. Stanford Jolley!

programme.title: Hell Town
programme.desc: In Hell Town (aka Born to the West) John Wayne is back in the saddle as two-fisted Dare Rudd, a roaming cowhand trying to prove he can win a womans love and outwit a crooked saloon owner. This exciting B-movie from Paramount Pictures was based on a novel by western writer Zane Grey. With a wild and wooly cast that includes Johnny Mack Brown, Marsha Hunt, Monte Blue, and Lucian Littlefield, director Charles Barton (Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein) gives us a tale of romance, action, and high stakes gambling!

programme.title: Between Men
programme.desc: When his young son is shot, John Wellington kills the culprit and flees. But his son Johnny recovers and is raised by Sir George. Some twenty years later Johnny sets out to find Sir Georges missing granddaughter. He finds her and also finds Rand, but neither of the two men realize they are father and son.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The Butch Cavendish gang ambushes a group of Texas Rangers, killing all but one. The surviving ranger is nursed back to health by Native American Tonto, and takes on the identity of a masked vigilante, determined to bring all outlaws to justice. Culled from episodes of the popular TV series, this feature is great fun for fans of the Lone Ranger. Starring Clayton Moore and Jay Silverheels.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: Randolph Scott plays James Barlow, an agent from Chicago hired to bring the notorious Reno brothers to justice. But wouldnt you know it? The Reno gang includes a beautiful young woman (Mala Powers), who catches Barlows eye. This western from director Tim Whelan (The Thief of Bagdad) features cinematography by two-time Oscar winner Ray Rennahan (Gone With The Wind), while the screenplay was by noted author Horace McCoy (They Shoot Horses, Dont They?). Theres also an all-star cast, including Forrest Tucker, J. Carrol Naish, Edgar Buchanan, Denver Pyle, and several other shaggy sidewinders!

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhouns watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: Red Ryder: Ride, Ryder, Ride!
programme.desc: Red Ryder encounters bandits trying to hold up the stagecoach carrying the owner of the Devils Hole newspaper, Libby Brooks and her brother Gerry. Red successfully drives off the attackers but becomes embroiled in further conflict, leading to a duel that nearly claims his life.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidys boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and hes not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. Its a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Nugget City to tear down a toll-gate on federal land. They are opposed by a woman mayor who uses the gate to keep out riff-raff and raise money for the towns growing needs. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are sent to Texas when it is discovered that a large number of Federal Gold Bonds held by the State of Texas are counterfeit. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie make their way to the town of Coffeyville where they run into the Dalton brothers who are seeking to commit a double bank robbery. Also starring Myron healey, Robert Bray and Robert Foulk. Look for future Daniel Boone/Davy Crocket star Fess Parker as a member of the Dalton gang. Episode originally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark and his partner Frankie head to Tombstone, Arizona to find Doc Holliday with suspicion that Holliday is involved in the gang activity there. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Kim Spalding, Frank Richards, James Craven amd Harry Harvey. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, an infamous and dangerous train robber escapes from prison, and the Judge sets out to capture him and send him back. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Mr. Kenyon and his children stumble upon a cache of gunpowder in an abandoned cabin. They take the news to Judge Bean angering Holman who plans on handing the explosives to the hostile Mescaleros. The lawmen must keep it from happening. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: The bank is robbed and the sheriff is killed while everyone is distracted by the wedding between Sand Creeks newspaper editor and a beautiful brunette. The sheriff being the editors best man, the grief-stricken editor begins to escalate the anger towards a suspected drifter with his bias reporting. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie is on the case when homesteaders are forced to sell their land for cheap due to suspicious circumstances. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Colonel and His Lady
programme.desc: An inexperienced young officer complicates matters when a tribe is accused of breaking their treaty.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: George Washington helps a young woman whose land is being threatened by an innkeeper. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper .Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Adam gets hurt while saving a woman from a group of indians, the woman must nurse Adam back to health as the rest of the tribe sets out to find her.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wagon Wheels
programme.desc: Randolph Scott (Ride the High Country) stars as Clint Belmet, the leader of a wagon train on the way to Oregon. Along the route he and his crew deal with various hardships, including Indian attacks and a fellow named Murdock (Monte Blue) who is out to stop them at any cost. With a cast that includes the likes of Gail Patrick and Billy Lee, this adventure saga was based on a novel by the western master, Zane Grey (Riders of the Purple Sage, Fighting Caravans). Trivia note: The films original title was Caravans West.

programme.title: Young Buffalo Bill
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars in this highly fictionalized account of Bill Codys life from director Joseph Kane (Dakota, Flame of Barbary Coast). What it lacks in accuracy is made up for with adventure, as well as and some of Roys great cowboy songs, including Blow Breeze Blow, and Rollin Down to Santa Fe. Other stars include George Gabby Hayes, Chief Thundercloud, and the lovely Pauline Moore (Young Mr. Lincoln, Charlie Chan at Treasure Island)

programme.title: Arizona Bound
programme.desc: The Rough Riders are called upon to help save a stagecoach line. From 1941, starring Buck Jones and Tim McCoy, plus Horace Murphy and Luana Walters. Directed by Spencer Bennett.

programme.title: Yellowneck
programme.desc: Location shooting in the Florida Everglades add to this dramatic tale of five Confederate deserters trying to get to Cuba. First, they must overcome snake bites, unfriendly Seminoles, and their own conflicts with each other. How many of the five will actually make it out alive? Lin McCarthy, Stephen Courtleigh, and Berry Kroeger star in this little known example of 1950s independent filmmaking.

programme.title: Six Gun Trail
programme.desc: Legendary cowboy star Tim McCoy stars as Captain William Carson, who along with his sidekick Magpie does battle with jewel thieves. Its an actionfilled drama of the West, with plenty of blazing guns and heman adventure! There are a couple of songs, too, including Moon Over the Plains but they arent sung by Tim McCoy. He was too darned tough to sing! Also starring Nora Lane, Ben Corbet; directed by Sam Newfield.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western. He and George Gabby Hayes strike it rich with a gold mine, only to find their lives complicated by women and crooked officials. Things get even messier when the good guys are framed for murder! Its all action here, particularly since legendary stuntman Yakima Cannut stars as one of the films heavies. Who will win the fight over the gold and the girl? Directed by Robert N. Bradbury for Monogram Pictures. Also starring Barbara Sheldon. (The film was also known as Gold Strike River.)

programme.title: Fighting Caravans
programme.desc: Clint Belmet (Gary Cooper) is a frontier scout with his hands full in this 1931 Paramount Pictures version of Zane Greys novel. Hes helping guide a wagon train across the country, fighting off various attacks on the way, and falling for his lovely Felice (Lily Damita). Belmets grizzled companions think he should leave the woman alone, but it gets lonely out on the trail, and Felices charms are hard to resist. Featuring such notable character actors of the period as Ernest Torrence, Tully Marshall, and Fred Kolher, this vintage Hollywood Western still packs a wallop!

programme.title: Picky Eaters
programme.desc: Find out how staff manage the nutritional needs of the zoo’s pickiest eaters.

programme.title: Enrichment
programme.desc: Explore the activities zoo staff introduce to keep the animal’s boredom at bay.

programme.title: Hope Renewed
programme.desc: Watch Hope take on more animals as she battles her own health issues.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: For Ferrari, the name alone raises the pulse; no other sports car has as much magic and myth as the fiery red icons from Maranello; whether on the road or on the race track, these cars are the center of attention.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Frank Slopianka is a racing junkie and constantly takes part in such events; US car fans Kati and Patrick join him for the Race 61, a rock and race festival in Finowfurt near Berlin.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: German entrepreneur Tillmann Moritz loves vintage cars and has a dream of driving through the U.S. in his Mercedes Cabriolet 280 SE 3.5; before he can make his dream come true, he needs to get his car across the French Riviera.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Tillmann starts his dream journey in New York, the city that never sleeps; with his Mercedes 280 SE convertible he visits the legendary classic car dealer Eliot Cuker who made his fortune with his passion for old cars.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Mitsubishi Outlander Plug-In Hybrid, the worlds first hybrid SUV with two electric motors and a 2-liter combustion engine; the Chevrolet Silverado, an American full-size pickup with a V8 and an average consumption of at least 15 liters.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: For a very long time, Bentley and Jaguar have opted not to produce any SUVs. But after a change of mind, they developed concepts for luxurious SUVs. Are luxury SUVs really necessary, or might they even be better than other luxury models?

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The SUVs Nissan X-Trail and BMW X4 arent typical offroaders; witnessing the presentation of the new X-Trail model and BMWs premiere of their X4; the SteinbeiSSer Trophy, where unusual offroad vehicles take part in a demanding rally.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Stunt coordinator Domi and his team give everything for spectacular stunts.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: On the industrial site at the Fliegl Vehicle Company in Triptis, the heart of Thuringen.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Heavy equipment comes into use as a car has to crash at full speed into a pile of gravel.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition; in early September, the region hosts thousands of bikers attending European Bike Week.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Biker Lifestyle

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker in Carinthia is a popular holiday paradise in southern Austria and a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the travel destination for thousands of bikers.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker in Carinthia hosts the annual European Bike Week.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region hosts thousands of bikers attending European Bike Week.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: An event for automotive and motor sports enthusiasts where the most extreme vehicles can be seen.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Tuning at the highest level.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Independent automobile tuner.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A Berlin-based producer that has rebuilt Porsche engines and given VW buses more than just a little steam on the rear axle.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The McLaren SLR from Mercedes.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Gemball is found in Leonberg, Germany.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC. In addition, a look at the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp and the uncompromising performance of Mercedes-AMGs SL models.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: In a city that loves to show off wealth and luxury, the Dubai police are eager to represent this image via its fleet of patrol cars that includes a Chevrolet Camaro, Lamborghini Aventador, Bentley GT, Ferrari FF, and Mercedes SLS.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Aerodynamics influence the performance, track stability and dynamics of a vehicle. Takes a look at the Porsche 911 Turbo S, the BMW M6 convertible and the Kelleners 330d in order to explore the influence of different wings and spoilers.

programme.title: Audi R8 V10 Plus
programme.desc: The second generation of the Audi R8; V10 naturally aspirated engine, up to 610 horsepower and 330 kilometers an hour; a supercar with a lot of character.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring. where motor fans really let your hair down on a spectacular and difficult race track and learn how to get fit for Motor Sports. That is why Motor Fans come here to the Nuerburgring throughout the year.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Entertaining clips from the Nuerburgring. Expect to see the pedal on the metal and rubber burning up the place.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: After the snow and ice clears on the Nuerburgring, the horsepower junkies return to the ring to tear it up once again.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Subaru shows the new look of WRX STI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Tesla Roadster Sport can go from 0-100 kph in 3.7 seconds with zero emission, only one aisle and only one engine with 50 kg. The 313 PS has four engines and no sound.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Infiniti wants to stir up the European market with its premium SUVs: The Power SUV FX50 S.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Arabella Classics is one of the most exclusive classic car rallies in Europe.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Featuring the VW Passat.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The search for the ideal auto, for the perfect race track, and for the ultimate accessory gadget.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Explore the passion behind the perfect form of mobility.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The VW Golf R, the Audi TTS and the BMW M 235i are put to the test in order to see if they are worthy of bearing the crown of their model range.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Constructing a giant luxury car with a lot of space isnt really difficult. But fitting just about everything you need for life into a small car is anything but an easy task. Perfect Ride reviews sexy city racers which try to achieve just that.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette try to win the competition.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Every car owner gets the chance to bring their tuned machines to the Sofitel Hotel Dubai Jumeirah beach; there, Saif Hattawi will assess each car based on speed, style and sound.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: The Walk at JBR, the most prestigious location in Dubai, is the background for fast customized cars in the Middle East; among the competitors are a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi are on the hunt for cars and ask car owners to bring their customized vehicles to Dubai; among the presented cars are a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: A tuned Lexus GSF, a Ford Mustang and a McLaren MP4-12C are put in the spotlight.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Featuring the Porsche 550 RS Spyder and the Audi Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: High tech turbo cars from the 80s get together at the SalzburgRing.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Le Jog classic car rally in Europe.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: At the Nurburgring in Germany, with DTM legends Bernd Schneider and Ellen Lohr.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type and the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A restored 300 SL prepares to race at the Mille Miglia classic car rally.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: A spring ride around Lake Starnberg in the Ferrari 458 Italia, a test drive of BMWs 6 series convertible at Table Mountain in South Africa, and a look at the Chevrolet Orlando family van.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Audi R8 GT, a model that the car manufacturer built only 333 units of, in everyday situations. In addition, taking a look at the Mazda MX5 roadster and Mercedes-AMG GT3.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Audi A6 2.0 TDI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Wiesmann MF5.

programme.title: Nurburgring 24 Hours
programme.desc: Nurburgring 24 Hours

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz SL 65 AMG is the ultimate German muscle car in a tailor-made suit. Also, a look at the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, a car that was once the Formula 1 safety car, and BMWs 6 series models.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC. In addition, a look at the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp and the uncompromising performance of Mercedes-AMGs SL models.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: In a city that loves to show off wealth and luxury, the Dubai police are eager to represent this image via its fleet of patrol cars that includes a Chevrolet Camaro, Lamborghini Aventador, Bentley GT, Ferrari FF, and Mercedes SLS.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Aerodynamics influence the performance, track stability and dynamics of a vehicle. Takes a look at the Porsche 911 Turbo S, the BMW M6 convertible and the Kelleners 330d in order to explore the influence of different wings and spoilers.

programme.title: Audi R8 V10 Plus
programme.desc: The second generation of the Audi R8; V10 naturally aspirated engine, up to 610 horsepower and 330 kilometers an hour; a supercar with a lot of character.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Kati and Patrick from Munich are huge fanas of US cars and proud owners of a 1972 Chevrolet Chevelle. But they are no longer satisfied with its 5.7-liter small block and want to buy a bigger engine.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Paaren / Glien near Berlin is host to the yearly Oldtimer Show. It attracts around 45,000 visitors, who are able to gaze at more than 5000 automobile treasures. Frank and his crew from Special Cars Berlin attend the event.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: With more than 500 supercars from Lamborghini, Ferrari or expensive brands like Bugatti and Koenigsegg, Germany is home to the worlds largest Supercars Rallye. Participants can look forward to action-packed stages.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Subaru shows the new look of WRX STI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Tesla Roadster Sport can go from 0-100 kph in 3.7 seconds with zero emission, only one aisle and only one engine with 50 kg. The 313 PS has four engines and no sound.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Infiniti wants to stir up the European market with its premium SUVs: The Power SUV FX50 S.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Arabella Classics is one of the most exclusive classic car rallies in Europe.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of Jaguar.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The story of Lamborghini.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The 1960s and 1970s were golden years for Opel; Ascona, Manta, Rekord and GT, an Opel was more than just a car, and the company built one classic after another; today, these car models are all icons.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The S-Class in the 1950s era.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Insight into the significance of the BMW 3 series and its glorious generations-long journey.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E101 Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of U.K.s winter rallies, with icy roads, skilled drivers and the landscapes.

programme.title: Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E102 Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.desc: There are rallies from all parts of the kingdom, starting with the Malcolm Wilson Rally.

programme.title: Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E103 Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.desc: The crew kicks things off in Wales with the Severn Valley Stages.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Its time once again for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers are already out there doing test laps, take a behind-the-scenes look at what really goes on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is regared as a dress rehearsal for the 24 hour race.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: A look at the 24 hour race, the Strong Man Run and the Tourist drivers.

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s; many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.desc: Enjoy a mix of X-Trial acrobatics and highlights from the Tour European Rally.

programme.title: Hotel Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has some unexpected guests who think he runs a hotel!

programme.title: Jurassic Bean
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur.

programme.title: Caring Bean
programme.desc: When Mrs. Wicket is disabled by Mr. Beans toy car, he takes care of her.

programme.title: Opera Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans car has broken down and he is late meeting Irma at the opera.

programme.title: Taxi Bean
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one.

programme.title: Muscle Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean needs to impress Irma, who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman.

programme.title: A New Friend
programme.desc: A small bird wants to befriend Mr. Bean, but its squawking sound annoys Mrs. Wicket.

programme.title: The Lift
programme.desc: Mr. Bean goes on a lift to the top floor of a toy shop, but Teddy gets stuck in the doors and jams the lift.

programme.title: Dig This
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden.

programme.title: Bean Hypnotised
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attends a hypnotism show where he unwittingly volunteers to be hypnotized.

programme.title: Car Wash
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it.

programme.title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket has a new hat that looks like Scrapper.

programme.title: Valuable Lessons
programme.desc: Two burglars hatch up an evil plan in which one of them disguises himself as a gentleman.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Mr. Bean prepares to give the children some tricks and treats they wont forget.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean paints a picture of Teddy, but accidentally splashes some green paint on the wall.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean paints a picture of Teddy, but accidentally splashes some green paint on the wall.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to read a book but he is disturbed by the noise of Mrs. Wicket and her friend.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey.

programme.title: A Round of Golf

programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes a superhero in an attempt to stop a cunning thief.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants an ice cream cone from the ice cream van.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean is feeling down when everyone forgot his birthday.

programme.title: Game Change
programme.desc: A group of four friends who just recently graduated sort out their quest for the big money by carrying out a ponzi scheme. The success of the first one urges them to carry out another one. But this time, nothing goes as planned.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep5
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep6
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep7
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep8
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: Check-Mate
programme.desc: Jada, suspicious about her husbands reason for always being tired, decides to hire an escort to test his fidelity. Things dont go according to plan, and she puts their relationship into jeopardy.

programme.title: Entangled
programme.desc: A once happy marriage starts to face crisis when the hunsband is promoted and starts having more responsibility at work, leaving his wife to believe he is now neglecting his family responsibilities.

programme.title: Burning Pain
programme.desc: After his wife becomes sick and unable to move properly, Michael takes on the extra responsibility of caring for her. Is he doing this out of the goodness of his heart or is there something nefarious going on behind close doors?

programme.title: AMC Music Moments - Playlist 464
programme.desc: AMC presents music from the latest African artists.

programme.title: A Fight For Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. After Amaka is given six months to live, she is abandoned by her husband. With nothing left to lose, she leaves her home and moves to Lagos, deciding to live her life to the fullest where she falls in love with Onyebuchi. Things come to a head when she realises that she has been lied to by her doctor and her husband comes back into the picture, wanting to fight for his wife.

programme.title: Dice
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Denrele Bada is a popular actor in Nollywood, known for his method acting. One strange night, Bada kills his girlfriend of 4 months and he strangely confesses to it. Yomi Taiwo is the state prosecutor determined to nail Bada for the chair. While investigating the case, Yomi discovers that Bada usually takes his characters home but this time, Badas latest character was a murderer sent to kill his girlfriend. What must Yomi do?

programme.title: Officer No.7
programme.desc: When the only son of a middle-aged widow is killed by roadside policemen looking for a bribe, policemen begin to fall like flies with no known cause of death, leading the concerned DPO to invite the assistance of the crime investigation department who send in one of their foremost detectives as more bodies drop.

programme.title: Satisfy Me
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Satisfy Me follows the life of a lady in her late thirties who wants to settle down by any means, which leads her into marrying a man with narcissistic personality disorder. She loses herself trying to boost his ego, not realising he is mentally unstable until it becomes too late.

programme.title: Becoming Mrs Eze
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When Tatiana accepts Ezes marriage proposal, her friends and family believe she has chosen wrong due to the fact that he is considered unrefined and broke, and Ezes family believe that Tatiana is a city girl that is not good enough for him. Will Tatiana and Ezes love be strong enough to withstand all the judgement?

programme.title: Humble Pie
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A down-on-their luck couple turn to a life of crime, calling themselves Bonnie and Clyde, when the man loses his job due to unfortunate circumstances. Their crimes lead them to a bickering couple, Eric and Zara, and the chance meeting has everyone re-evaluating their actions.

programme.title: Wrongfully Hers
programme.desc: Hijinks follows after Perpetual, pretending to be a sophisticated socialite, befriends Gina who has fallen in love with Esa, not realising he is Perpetuals unappreciated boyfriend.

programme.title: Kill Fred
programme.desc: Out for revenge, Rose, plots to kill her husband, Fred, with the help of her lover, Vic, not realising Vic has his own reasons for wanting Fred dead.

programme.title: Imperfection
programme.desc: A man struggles to deal with a nagging wife while she also finds difficulty keeping up with his nonchalance. But a balance must be struck if theyll make marriage a success.

programme.title: Bitter Love
programme.desc: Jordan, a notorious playboy is faced with an unexpected ultimatum. To claim his inheritance, he must do the one thing he swore he’d never do, get married. Forced to trade his bachelor antics for a life of commitment, Jordan scrambles to find the perfect partner but soon realises that love, and marriage, isn’t as simple as sealing a deal.

programme.title: Her Flatmate
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When Rekia moves in with Kiki, they are on their way to becoming fast friends until Mabel, Rekia’s best friend, comes visiting and suddenly Kiki finds herself living with a devil in disguise.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. In a bid to find love, plus sized Tobi, decides to slide into the DM’s of her crush, Mofe, using the picture of her slimmer friend, Sharon. Things get complicated when Mofe wants to meet up with Tobi in person.

programme.title: We Did It For Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A desperate guy down on his luck deceitfully takes a loan from a loan shark to secure a future with his soul mate, a decision he soon regrets.

programme.title: Game Change
programme.desc: A group of four friends who just recently graduated sort out their quest for the big money by carrying out a ponzi scheme. The success of the first one urges them to carry out another one. But this time, nothing goes as planned.

programme.title: Obsession
programme.desc: Jealousy rears its ugly head and puts a couples relationship in jeopardy when they invite guests to stay over in their home.

programme.title: Bennie
programme.desc: Bennie, a mother of three, knows her time is near after months of keeping her ovarian cancer a secret. To test her husband’s ability to take care of their children when she’s gone, she disappears without a trace, leaving him alone to cater for the children.

programme.title: The Missing Package
programme.desc: In The Missing Package, Detective Lazarus is almost done for the day when an unassuming middle-aged man walks in and reports a package he is expecting missing, but more importantly is the carrier who seems to have disappeared into thin air. This sets Detective Lazarus on a wild goose chase to find what appears to be a package determined not to be found and a carrier who appears to no longer exist.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep9
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep10
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: Salamatus Rhapsody
programme.desc: Salamatu, a young woman torn between her love for hip-hop and her family’s strong traditional values and expectations, must win her father over to support her love for hip hop.

programme.title: Faithful Sin
programme.desc: A philandering married woman causes problems for both hers and her neighbours marriages when she gets pregnant and doesnt know who the father of her child may be.

programme.title: The Weekend
programme.desc: A woman discovers a heart-breaking secret. She plans a steamy intimate weekend with her husband, but this weekend is full of questions, anger, rage and blood. She will not stop until she gets her answers.

programme.title: Ralias Secret
programme.desc: Ralia, feeling conflicted and burdened by a secret plan she harbours, must protect her secret at all cost when a familiar face from her past finds her and threatens to unravel her plans.

programme.title: AMC Music Moments - Playlist 516
programme.desc: AMC presents music from the latest African artists.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Adeoluwa Akintoba
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Jouluharmonia
programme.desc: Lahjakkaan laulaja-lauluntekijan sydan sarkyy, kun kuuluisa muusikkopoikaystava jattaa hanet juuri ennen joulua. Han palaa kotikaupunkiinsa, jossa tapaa vanhoja ystavia - ja tapaa komean poikamiehen, jolla on ollut sydansuruja. Yhdessa he loytavat uudelleen musiikin, romantiikan, perhesiteet - ja joulun taian.

programme.title: High Holiday
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Liz ei ole kovin innokas viemaan poikaystavaansa vanhoillisen perheensa joulupaivalliselle. Mutta poikaystava ehdottaa, etta Liz maustaisi salaattikastikkeen marijuanalla, jotta tunnelma vapautuisi. Alkaa kaaos, kun kaikki ovat tietamattaan pilvessa ja perheensisaiset salaisuudet paljastuvat.

programme.title: The Christmas Setup
programme.desc: Asianajaja Hugo matkustaa New Yorkista kotikaupunkiinsa Milwaukieen tapaamaan aitiaan. Äiti esittelee hanelle vanhan lukioaikaisen ihastuksensa Patrickin, ja parin valilla alkaa kipinoida. Mutta Hugolle tarjotaan unelmatyota Lontoossa ja hanen on valittava: ura vai juuri loytynyt rakkaus.

programme.title: Santa Who?
programme.desc: Oikea joulupukki putoaa reesta ja menettaa muistinsa. Han tormaa pian tympaantyneeseen TV-toimittajaan, joka on hanen ainoa toivonsa palauttaa muisti ajoissa, etta joulu voidaan pelastaa.

programme.title: Mina armahdan Mooses ei (The Troublemakers)
programme.desc: Travis (Terence Hill) on lannen nopein vetaja. Hanen veljensa Moses (Bud Spencer) on vakeva kuin karhu, mutta monin verroin pahansisuisempi ja seudun kovin palkkionmetsastaja. Kun heidan vanha aitimuorinsa paattaa saattaa veljekset yhteen jouluna, saa Travis tehtavakseen houkutella Moseksen kotiin.

programme.title: Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Tom on luonut uran auttamalla asiakkaita, jotta nama loytaisivat rakastetulleen taydellisen lahjan. Joulun lahestyessa Tomin paras ystava Paul pyytaa Tomia keksimaan lahjan tyttoystavalleen Jennylle. Kun Tom tutustuu Jennyyn paremmin, asia mutkistuu, koska han huomaa rakastuneensa kaverinsa tyttoystavaan. Tyotehtava on melkein hoidettu, mutta Tom on pahoillaan, koska hanen ainoa mahdollisuutensa loytaa sielunkumppani on kariutumassa.

programme.title: Hemmetin Joulu
programme.desc: Telepaattisia kykyja omaava koira pakenee valtion sulkutilasta- ja juoksee suoraan kahden nuoren veljen rakastavaan syliin. Washingtonin johto ei luovu salaisesta aseestaan helpolla.

programme.title: Bennettin Laulujuhla
programme.desc: Bennettin ja Songin perhe palaa jouluksi uutisten kera. Rouva Song odottaa lasta 14 adoptiolapsen joukkoon. Perheen on lyottaydyttava yhteen haastaakseen kiinteistokehittajan, joka haluaa sulkea setansa monitoimitalon vammaisille ja vaarassa oleville lapsille. Rakkaudella, tiimityolla ja joulun taikuudella paiva pelastuu!

programme.title: Avain Jouluun
programme.desc: Kun tyytymaton tonttu nakee tilaisuuden vallata pohjoisnavan- han kaantaa taikakoneella aikaa taaksepain Joulupukista- joka alkaa nuortua nopeasti. Joulumuori on vangittu ja karkkitankovankilassa. Uskollisen tontun, pikkutyton, jolla on taika-avain - ja teini-ikaisen joulupukin on kaannettava aikaa eteenpain - ja pelastettava joulun tulevaisuus.

programme.title: Joulun ihmemaa
programme.desc: Joulun aika NYC:ssa on kaikkea muuta kuin ihanaa kamppailevalle taiteilija Heidi Neillille.

programme.title: Joulu Kruunun Kera
programme.desc: Kun menestyva nainen palaa kotikaupunkiinsa - elvyttamaan perheensa joulufestivaalin, - han tapaa komean muukalaisen, joka auttaa tapahtuman jarjestamisessa. Heidan valillaan kipinoi, mutta han ei tieda - etta prinssi on valeasussa ja etsii joulun henkea. Vaaditaan kuninkaallinen joulun ihme, jotta heidan sydamensa yhtyvat.

programme.title: Ihme Joulujarvella
programme.desc: Kun teinipoika menettaa parhaan ystavansa ja isansa joulun aikaan- han jattaa lempilajinsa jaakiekon ja hylkaa ystavansa. Kun jaakaukalo ilmestyy jaatyneelle jarvelle hanen kotinsa lahelle, han muistelee hyvia aikoja.

programme.title: Joulun alla
programme.desc: CHRISTMAS UNDER WRAPS, esittelee Candace Cameron Buren tohtori Lauren Brunellin roolissa, joka hyvaksyy tyopaikan Alaskassa menetettyaan seka poikaystavansa etta arvostetun leikkausapurahansa, mutta saa tietaa, etta kyseessa on pieni sairaala pikkukaupungissa.

programme.title: Silent Night: A Song for the World
programme.desc: Maailman kuuluisimman joululaulun syntytarina. Dokumenttielokuva kertoo, miten nuori Joseph Mohr paatyi kirjoittamaan vuonna 1818 ensiesityksensa saaneen laulun "Jouluyo, juhlayo".

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Tassa lamminhenkisessa joulukomediassa Rodriguezin perheen kauempana asuvat jasenet kokoontuvat vanhempiensa kotiin kenties viimeista kertaa viettamaan joulua yhdessa.

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: En forsikringsmann som kjemper med tap og kjærlighet, oppdager nye muligheter i en uke full av uventede hendelser og komiske vendepunkter.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Tom on luonut uran auttamalla asiakkaita, jotta nama loytaisivat rakastetulleen taydellisen lahjan. Joulun lahestyessa Tomin paras ystava Paul pyytaa Tomia keksimaan lahjan tyttoystavalleen Jennylle. Kun Tom tutustuu Jennyyn paremmin, asia mutkistuu, koska han huomaa rakastuneensa kaverinsa tyttoystavaan. Tyotehtava on melkein hoidettu, mutta Tom on pahoillaan, koska hanen ainoa mahdollisuutensa loytaa sielunkumppani on kariutumassa.

programme.title: Maanviljelija ja Belle Pelastavat Joulumaan
programme.desc: Kun kuuluisa malli palaa pikkukaupunkiinsa juuri ennen joulua - han tapaa lapsuudenystavansa, jolla on nyt nuori tytar ja maatila. Pian kipinat lentavat heidan valillaan - ja han alkaa oppia, etta rakkaus ja kauneus tulevat sisalta. Kaupunki on vaarassa menettaa rakkaan Joulumaan festivaalinsa. He huomaavat, etta ihmeita voi tapahtua paattavaisyydella ja uskolla.

programme.title: Santa Who?
programme.desc: Oikea joulupukki putoaa reesta ja menettaa muistinsa. Han tormaa pian tympaantyneeseen TV-toimittajaan, joka on hanen ainoa toivonsa palauttaa muisti ajoissa, etta joulu voidaan pelastaa.

programme.title: Jouluharmonia
programme.desc: Lahjakkaan laulaja-lauluntekijan sydan sarkyy, kun kuuluisa muusikkopoikaystava jattaa hanet juuri ennen joulua. Han palaa kotikaupunkiinsa, jossa tapaa vanhoja ystavia - ja tapaa komean poikamiehen, jolla on ollut sydansuruja. Yhdessa he loytavat uudelleen musiikin, romantiikan, perhesiteet - ja joulun taian.

programme.title: A Christmas in Royal Fashion
programme.desc: Kansainvalisen PR-yrityksen kaunis ja lahjakas assistentti Kristin Cooper saa vastuulleen vaatealalla tyoskentelevan liikemies Carsonin vuotuisen joulun muotinaytoksen ja huutokaupan jarjestamisen.

programme.title: Jouluhaat
programme.desc: Haley Foster pakeni lapsuutensa pikkukaupungista Pineridgesta ja siirtyi suurkaupunkilaiselamaan losangelesilaisena haajarjestelijana rva Reynoldsin omistamassa eliittiluokan yrityksessa.

programme.title: Bennettin Laulujuhla
programme.desc: Bennettin ja Songin perhe palaa jouluksi uutisten kera. Rouva Song odottaa lasta 14 adoptiolapsen joukkoon. Perheen on lyottaydyttava yhteen haastaakseen kiinteistokehittajan, joka haluaa sulkea setansa monitoimitalon vammaisille ja vaarassa oleville lapsille. Rakkaudella, tiimityolla ja joulun taikuudella paiva pelastuu!

programme.title: A Taste Of Christmas
programme.desc: Kun pikkukaupungin yrittelias leipuri Emily saa omatekoisen joulukalenterin salaiselta ihailijalta, paikalliset haluavat kiihkeasti selvittaa lahettajan henkilollisyyden. Kaupungissa juoruillaan seka joulukalenterista etta Emilyn rakkausseikkailuista, koska kaikki poikamiehet ovat kiinnostuneita hanesta. Mutta Emilya kiinnostaa hanen pahin kilpailijansa, ranskalaisleipuri Gerard.

programme.title: Tonttutytto Pelastaa Joulun
programme.desc: Kun New Yorkin mafia sieppaa joulupukin juuri ennen joulua- Tonttutytto, aivan tavallinen tonttu, tulee apuun. Han lyottaytyy yhteen ystavansa Saihkyn kanssa- pysayttaakseen pahikset, loytaakseen joulupukin ja pelastaakseen joulun.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: Tyoton taidemaalari Anna kamppailee taloutensa kanssa, mutta loytaa tyopaikan kirean liikemiehen Marcin henkilokohtaisena jouluostosten tekijana.

programme.title: 12 Joulukoiraa: Suuri koiranpentupelastus
programme.desc: Dovervillen lapset kilpailevat aikaa ja mahdottomia todennakoisyyksia vastaan- pelastaakseen koiraorpokodin haikailemattomalta pohatalta.

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: En forsikringsmann som kjemper med tap og kjærlighet, oppdager nye muligheter i en uke full av uventede hendelser og komiske vendepunkter.

programme.title: Fatman
programme.desc: Vinksahtaneessa nykymaailmassa Joulupukki on todella olemassa ja vararikossa, koska lapset ovat enimmakseen tuhmia eika valtiolta heru tukea tyovoimakuluihin kysynnan laskiessa. Joulupukki on ryypiskeleva, asetta heilutteleva pahis, koska kun lentelee ympari maailmaa, joku voi joskus ampua.

programme.title: Joulukuponki
programme.desc: Entinen luistelumestari alkaa opettaa ystavansa lammella- ja jakaa "kuponkeja" houkutellakseen uusia oppilaita. Kun hanen entinen lukiorakkaansa (ja nyt kuuluisa jaakiekkoilija)- tuo veljentyttarensa tunneille, vanhat liekit syttyvat uudelleen- ja joulu on taynna uutta mahdollisuutta rakkauteen.
