programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 1
programme.desc: For this new episode, Yann Arthus-Bertrand travels through Senegal to encounter men and women who dedicate their lives to preserving the environment. One of the major ecological stakes of the country is fishing and the mangrove ecosystem which, like in some many other parts of the world, faces major threats. Yann Arthus-Bertrand presents the struggle of Haidar El Ali, chosen among one of the world’s most active ecologists. He creates protected marine areas and reforests the disappeared mangrove of his country. He’s managed to convince thousands of Senegalese to plant with him ten million mangrove trees.

programme.title: Spicy kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Spicy kitchen
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes us on a tour of spices and aromatic plants. Spices are a call to travel, to faraway lands and to the unknown. In the kitchen, they bear witness to our relationship with others, reflecting our vision of the world. Julies journey will introduce us to the famous black pepper, thanks to Erwann de Kerros, an insatiable pepper seeker. Aromatic plants will also be in the spotlight, as we pick them with Edouard Loubet in the Luberon...

programme.title: Masashi Hirao
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Masashi Hirao
programme.desc: In 2003, Masashi Hirao became the last apprentice of Japans great Bonsai master Saburo Kato. Before Saburo-san died he passed on to his apprentice a seemingly impossible mission: to prevent the 1000 year old art from dying-out in the face of a rapidly changing world and achieve his master’s vision of bringing peace to the world through bonsai. Masashi’s early efforts are dogged by many failures but combining his master’s guidance and modern instincts he sets out to travel the world and discover the way, drawing on innovative trends in contemporary art.

programme.title: Tough pregnancies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Tough pregnancies
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni are worried, since a pregnancy with twins is always riskier. She’s due in two months, and has already undergone two medical interventions. Kim, nineteen, is fine physically, but she has to face her family’s criticism: she still lives at her parent’s, and the absence of the father-to-be worries them a great deal. Coralie would rather be safe than sorry, and meets with a prenatal consultant. Her nightmare: being turned down for an epidural procedure... Nathalie and Naoufel are looking at the bright side of life and are chilling on granddaddy’s boat, before letting themselves enjoy a family photo shoot.

programme.desc: He takes us to Petra in Jordan. We discover how the Nabataeans became specialists in collecting rainwater, which they managed meticulously. Then, we find ourselves in Las Vegas, on the verge of a shortage, and in Amman, Jordan, to discover the daily difficulties linked to the shortage and rationing of water. In Israel, the Dead Sea is disappearing. Due to intensive agriculture, the Jordan River and other rivers no longer supply it with enough water. In France, the Loire is for nature lovers, today a multitude of species have come to recolonise the river, including the famous wild salmon. In Jordan, in the red desert of Wadi Rum, we meet Khaleel Maiteq, who shares with us his life and that...

Well visit Brittany, then the Normandy coast where fishing is the regional sport, and Corsica, where the far northeast of the island lives to the rhythm of lobster. programme.title: Journey To The West
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Journey To The West
programme.desc: Finding no way forward in Japan, Masashi looks to break through overseas. But although bonsai had spread widely in his master’s time, it seems doomed to wither if someone doesn’t do something to make the art form fun and relevant in a fast paced modern world. Finally on a trip to Italy, Masashi Hirao may have found a way to break the wall and build a bridge to new audiences. He determines to topple a 1000 years of tradition and turn the art of bonsai into a pop culture phenomenon, combining it with other art forms and focused on the process of creation as much as on the result.

programme.title: Last preps
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Last preps
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni’s boys are born! But they came in a little bit early, and have been admitted in neonatal resuscitation... Coralie and Florent are still walking on clouds as they wait for their daughter, Lena. So are Nathalie and Naoufel, who arrange a tour of the future baby’s bedroom. Things are still tense between Kim and her parents. Her father blames here for having left school too early and the family makes no effort to hide their dislike of Pierre, the would-be father, who is still a no-show. They go as far as opposing Kim’s preferred choice for the future boy’s name, since it was his father that came up with the idea...

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 2
programme.desc: For this new episode, Yann Arthus-Bertrand travels through Senegal to encounter men and women who dedicate their lives to preserving the environment. One of the major ecological stakes of the country is fishing and the mangrove ecosystem which, like in some many other parts of the world, faces major threats. Yann Arthus-Bertrand presents the struggle of Haidar El Ali, chosen among one of the world’s most active ecologists. He creates protected marine areas and reforests the disappeared mangrove of his country. He’s managed to convince thousands of Senegalese to plant with him ten million mangrove trees.

programme.desc: We find ourselves in Israel in the Negev desert, Elaine is looking for solutions to combat desertification. The object of her research: trees, which consume little water. A village where farmers use an irrigation and water-sharing system that is over 300 years old and based on respect and trust. And in Gaza, Palestine, where specialists are fighting to save Palestinian children made ill by unsafe water. In the Jordan Valley, where three countries in conflict face the same problems: the lack of...

programme.title: The taste of honey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The taste of honey
programme.desc: Honey was the first sweet condiment in history! It has also been known and consumed as a remedy since Antiquity. In France, we find an infinite variety of honey: acacia, chestnut, fir, rosemary, orange, spruce, oak, linden or lavender... Well cross forests, fields and even towns, as bees also forage in urbanized areas. Well then cook up emblematic recipes like Vercel gingerbread. Finally, well discover the European dark bee. Protecting this 80-million-year-old bee has become the spearhead of some passionate beekeepers.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Mainstream VS Indie
programme.desc: Masashi returns from Italy with a new sense of purpose and direction. He will pioneer a radical path as a Bonsai performer, using his childhood powers of concentration and speed to create a new art form and drag bonsai in front of a new generation. Masashi’s bold style makes him a star in Japan. But as his following in Japan grows, Masashi pushes forward with his broader mission - to spread Bonsai culture around the world. He accepts an invitation to take his radical new performance art to Penang, Malaysia, where he discovers new insights into the power of bonsai to bring peace.

programme.title: The Challenge of Leadership
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - The Challenge of Leadership
programme.desc: After years of struggling Masashi Hirao feels he is finding clues to bonsai’s future, changing bonsai’s image of tired old men pruning trees. He has a radical idea to challenge tradition further at the 3-yearly international Setouchi Triennale, the largest art event in Japan. Masashi will stage an Avant Garde personal exhibition as well as a ground-breaking solo performance climaxing with a collaboration with a radical, anti-modernisation punk band, in direct contradiction of Masashi’s mission. It will be a bonsai showdown. Tradition and modernisation clashing head on. Is it possible to pursue change, and preserve tradition? Masashi is in unexplored territory.

programme.title: Saviour or Saboteur
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Saviour or Saboteur
programme.desc: Masashi Hirao is building an entirely new brand, and a new art form: performance bonsai. His quest to push boundaries brings fresh challenges, which come to the fore as he heads to Kuala Lumpur to team up with unconventional Malaysian realist painter, Lee Mar. Little goes to plan and the event strains both artist’s talents to the limit. But the challenge is nothing compared to the test when his radical approach wins him an invitation to the international Bonsai Without Borders Summit in China: 75 world-class Bonsai Masters from 35 countries. The bonsai bad boy has officially arrived on the world stage. It is the ultimate test in front of the most critical audience possible.

programme.title: Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.desc: Above all, these reports are an opportunity for Yann Arthus-Bertrand to take stock of the planet and denounce certain human behaviors that are at the root of dramatic, even irreversible, environmental and climatic degradation. Off to Tokyo, then Kenya, to an animal sanctuary. Then on to Mount Fuji to learn how to live there, and all the plastic that clogs up the seas. Reports will focus on everyday products, chosen for their destructive production practices for both people and the environment.

programme.title: The taste of bread
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The taste of bread
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes you on a bread trail to uncover the dedicated artisan bakers and millers. Her adventure will lead her through the Libourne region, then onwards to the North of France, the Ardèche, and the Aisne, where bakers have transformed bread into a powerful catalyst for social cohesion. While some individuals may avoid bread, particularly due to gluten-related concerns, others have chosen to reposition it at the forefront of the dining experience by championing its nutritional benefits. This commitment is shared by several chefs whom Julie will meet at the conclusion of her expedition.

programme.title: Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.desc: Val Kahl is in the heart of Ojai, the lavender town, where she takes a tour in Ojai Valley Lavender Festival and tastes drink, gluten-free cookies and organic cooking products made of lavender. She later found herself in the middle of lavender field while stopping by the Frog Creek Farm. After working out on the hot power yoga around palm trees in Caravan Outpost, she heads out to Gratitude Rock for an organic fresh juice tasting with an avocado ranch view.

programme.title: Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.desc: Val goes to Nicholas, a master of enlightenment, at his wellness ranch. Here, Val will try out some new high-tech relaxation sessions. She will then go to one of the zenest hotels in California, where she will participate in a yoga session in a Japanese pagoda, followed by a coconut massage. She will test a Cryo-Cafe, a new concept store that mixes coffee break and cryotherapy session. Finally, she will attend a Theremin session, a very special relaxation ceremony.

programme.title: Thinning seedlings
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Thinning seedlings
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to continue gardening together. In our previous episodes, we sowed chives and radishes. Today, were going to learn how to take good care of them. And as a bonus, well show you a great technique to easily get even more plants in your garden. Lets get started!

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Risotto with asparagus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Risotto with asparagus
programme.desc: In this recipe, we prepare a creamy asparagus risotto, a delicate and refined dish. Arborio rice is slowly simmered in a flavorful broth, then combined with crisp asparagus and melted Parmesan. A hint of lemon and fresh herbs enhances this delicious and comforting meal.

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare delicious potato cutlets accompanied by a creamy vegetable puree. The cutlets are crispy on the outside with Japanese breadcrumbs and tender on the inside, while the celeriac puree adds a touch of sweetness and lightness. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Episode 15
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth in Sports - Season 5 - Episode 15
programme.desc: The TV show Earth in Sports will immerse you into the point of view of different athlete who are practicing extreme or peaceful sports at the best spot all around the world. You will discover the most beautiful landscapes and some of them are nearly impossible to reach.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.desc: Juliette has long been aware of the delicate beauty of nature. For years she spent her life on the sea, organising regattas for the traditional sailboats that are famous in the French region of Morbihan. Her appreciation for the elements made for a smooth transition as she decided to leave the water behind and return to the earth. Learning to shape a ball of clay into a graceful and elegant object, she discovered a passion for ceramics. Today, she lives from her creations and makes pieces that reflect their surroundings, the stunning Gulf of Morbihan.

programme.title: Anna (Brittany)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Anna (Brittany)
programme.desc: Anna’s unusual background provided inspiration for her life change. Her career began as a wolf trainer for cinema and it was during these years that she developed her deep love for animals. After being tired of seeing them used as props and constantly in cages, she decided to leave the world of show business behind and start an eco-friendly sheep and goat pasture. To further share her passion for these gentle animals, Anna has opened a conservatory farm where visitors can experience first-hand the joys of being close to nature. She also makes amazing goat cheese!

programme.title: Cristina (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Cristina (Spain)
programme.desc: At 31 years old, the last thing Cristina expected when she went to see the doctor about a blocked ear was to leave the consultation with a diagnosis for Breast Cancer. This young and passionate sociologist decided to apply the same philosophy to her treatment as she did when surfing: when a wave crashes down on you, get up and try again. Through her healing journey she deepened her love for the ocean and also discovered the therapeutic capabilities of yoga for cancer patients. Today she shares her practice through surf and yoga retreats and is specialised in oncological yoga, helping others heal.

programme.title: Idoia (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Idoia (Spain)
programme.desc: Idoia thrives on weaving together the sources of inspiration that surround her. Heavily influenced by the natural beauty of her home region of Galicia, Spain, she creates unique woven pieces from diverse and beautiful materials. Idoia’s pieces represent her vision of a modern woman, drawing from the traditions and experiences of those who perfected the craft before her and also pushing to innovate and adapt her creations for the modern world. Her recent collaboration with luxury fashion house Loewe is a dream come true for this modern artisan.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.desc: With Bangladesh as a running thread, Yann Arthus-Bertrand meets several people who have changed their lives to dedicate themselves to a major project. In Bangladesh, Yves and Runa Marre have created the Friendship Foundation. Among other things, they’ve created a floating hospital installed on an old barge bought in France. Julie Andersen, an ex-advertising executive from New York has come to South Africa to defend sharks with her Shark Angels Foundation. In North India, Kartik Satyanarayan is helping to stop the dreadful exploitation of the lippus bears (dancing bears). He’s created Wildlife SOS, a preserve to rehabilitate the bears that have been rescued and to give work to the men of...

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos

programme.desc: This episode features daring emergencies and rescues caught on tape.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: A drunken female driver flirts with an arresting officer; a suspect crashes into a snowplow, bringing an end to a high-speed chase.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features a chase in California, a backroad pursuit and civil unrest in Washington D.C.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: A robbery suspect makes a call on his cell phone while fleeing from police at 100 miles per hour; an elderly clerk pulls a knife on a robber.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos

programme.desc: This episode features a stripper, an interrogator and a cop killer in a showdown at a trailer park.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos

programme.desc: This episode features a chase in Colorado, a liquor store robbery and rioting in Argentina.

programme.desc: High-speed car chases in Texas and California, a riot in Minnesota and an undercover drug bust in Florida.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features the wildest roadside stops caught on camera.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features a chase in California, an armed robbery in Canada and a hateful march that goes berserk.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features a chase in Nevada, a careless driver who hits a cyclist and an attempted convenience store robbery.

programme.title: Champion Vs. Creator, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba’s soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people’s minds. Can Kaiba defeat an opponent who knows his moves even before he does?

programme.title: Champion Vs. Creator, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus’s Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba’s soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba! Yugi has had enough!

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: T’was the night before the final battle, and many creatures are stirring! Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus’s secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Duel Identity, Part 1
programme.desc: Under Pegasus’s weighty glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish tactical errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpies Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the intense pressure?

programme.title: Duel Identity, Part 2
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Keiths Machinations, Part 1
programme.desc: Joey frantically searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it from him. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new, and unexpected, friend!

programme.title: Keiths Machinations, Part 2
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith’s Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith’s battle strategy to metalicize his Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1
programme.desc: With his pride in his strength as a duelist on the line, Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other’s strategies and cards as they struggle to keep their thoughts of past loyalties at the back of their minds.

programme.title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him, the very card he gave Joey as a sign of friendship! However, as the two battle each other valiantly and one comes out the victor, they find confirmation of the strength of their friendship that surpasses any duel.

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba and Mokuba on the line. Meanwhile, Tristan and Bakura infiltrate the castle to find the Kaiba brothers, but at this crucial moment, is Bakura turning back into his evil self again?

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi’s monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi’s soul into a card, just like Kaiba?

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus’s mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus’s Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi crumples in exhaustion under the crippling power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi’s chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi crumples in exhaustion under the crippling power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi’s chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi’s Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh? The smallest, weakest creature in the game? Has Yugi given up, or does he have one last strategy to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat? The Shadow Game comes to a close!

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: The Pegasus Saga comes to an end, but a new journey is about to begin! Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi’s mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: The Wrath of Rebecca
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her! She’s here to claim back the card that Grandpa stole from her grandfather many years ago!

programme.title: Ties of Friendship
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it’s not the power of the cards, but the heart that’s in them that counts.

programme.title: Depths of Darkness
programme.desc: Shark finally faces off with his archenemy, Quattro! Will Shark get his long awaited revenge, or will he end up sleeping with the fishes?!

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: It’s the cataclysmic conclusion between Shark and Quattro! If Shark doesn’t make a comeback from the depths of defeat, not only is he out of the tournament, but his quest for justice will go unserved!

programme.title: Rockin and Rollin
programme.desc: There’s chaos in the canyon when Yuma duels Nistro to see who will get the last spot in the World Duel Carnival semifinals! Can Yuma dodge defeat in the desert, or is Nistro destined to rock Yumas world?

programme.title: Doctor Visit
programme.desc: When Yuma’s deck goes missing, he and the gang set out to look for it! But when their search leads them to Heartland City, they end up finding much more than they bargained for!

programme.title: Duel of Destiny - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma sets his sights on reeling in Shark in the first battle of the semifinals, but when his foe starts off dueling like a guppy, Yuma questions if he’s being baited! Is it too late for Yuma now to escape a sinister Shark attack?

programme.title: Duel of Destiny - Part 2
programme.desc: This is it! Yuma’s jaw-dropping duel against Shark in the World Duel Carnival semifinals draws to a finish! Can Yuma rise above his razor-sharp rival, or will he be dragged down to the depths of defeat?

programme.title: The Hart of the Matter
programme.desc: The mighty masked duelist Vetrix faces off against the Number Hunter Kite! Unfortunately for Kite, Vetrix springs a shocking surprise that makes dueling all but impossible! Can Kite rise above Vetrix’s heinous handicap, or has this undefeated duelist finally met his match?

programme.title: Change of Hart
programme.desc: The explosive end to the battle between Kite and Vetrix roars to a finish! As the battle climaxes, Yuma sets out to free Kite’s brother Hart from Vetrix’s grasp, while Kite duels knowing full well that Hart’s safety hangs in the balance! Can either of them rise above the risks, or are they both fated to fail?

programme.title: Sphere of Fear - Part 1
programme.desc: It all comes down to this! Yuma squares off against Vetrix in a battle that will determine the first ever World Duel Carnival Champion! Can Yuma figure out a way to outduel Vetrix, or will Vetrix and his devastating deck destroy Yuma’s chance of being a champion?!

programme.title: Sphere of Fear - Part 2
programme.desc: As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix’s shocking secret!

programme.title: Sphere of Fear - Part 3
programme.desc: This is it! The earth-shattering ending of Yuma’s duel against Vetrix! Can Yuma rise above Vetrix’s unrelenting onslaught, or will he meet defeat and lose everything he holds dear – his soul, his Numbers and… Astral?

programme.title: The Countdown Begins
programme.desc: Yuma learns the details of Dr. Faker’s diabolical plan to destroy Astral World! Can Yuma figure out a way to stop Faker, or is the future of Astral World a thing of the past?

programme.title: Legendary Heroes, Part 1
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of KaibaCorp trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game! Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Legendary Heroes, Part 2
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can Yugi and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Legendary Heroes, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mai lose all their life points! Can Yugi and Kaiba, two former opponents, work together and face the biggest enemy of their lives?

programme.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: A new student, Duke Devlin, defeats Joey in a game of Duel Monsters, forcing Joey to become his servant. Duke forces Joey to wear a dog costume and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 2
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey’s freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start. His chances do not improve as Duke reveals that he designed Dungeon Dice Monsters with Pegasus’s aid! Can Yugi learn the new complex rules, much less form a strategy, before he is soundly defeated?

programme.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi’s position is helpless!

programme.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 4
programme.desc: After Duke’s all-powerful Orgoth the Relentless dices Yugi’s entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points! Yugi’s last hope rests in one final dice roll in the thrilling conclusion to Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: The Mystery Duelist, Part 1
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle, and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back! However, this is no ordinary soothsayer; he’s a familiar and formidable foe from Duelist Kingdom… or is he? Can Yugi beat him all alone without the help of his friends or the spirit inside the Puzzle?

programme.title: The Mystery Duelist, Part 2
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze! Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: The Past Is Present
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed! Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago! The ancient games have resurrected in modern times, along with three almighty beasts of unstoppable devastation – the Egyptian God Monsters!

programme.title: Steppin Out
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea is going to help him uncover the mysteries of his past! However, their search is interrupted by the dancing duelist Johnny Steps and his musical monsters of rock!

programme.title: Obelisk the Tormentor
programme.desc: To face the future, Yugi must first look into the past! Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again! Meanwhile, Kaiba tests the hidden powers of his Egyptian God Card Obelisk the Tormentor against the fury of Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon!

programme.title: Stalked by the Rare Hunters
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel where if Joey loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Though Joey pummels his foes with his mighty monster armada, eliminating life points isn’t the only path to victory…

programme.title: Yugi vs. Rare Hunter, Part 1: Battle City Begins
programme.desc: It’s time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey’s Red-Eyes B. Dragon. However, Yugi’s falling into the same trap that led to Joey’s demise!

programme.title: Yugi vs. Rare Hunter, Part 2: Up Against Exodia
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter’s strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it’s too late to stop him! The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck! How can Yugi stop the unstoppable Exodia?

programme.title: The ESP Duelist, Part 1
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey’s next on his hit list! What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey’s hand?

programme.title: The ESP Duelist, Part 2
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba’s extrasensory perception is a hoax, but he’s not yet free from Espas mental manipulations! Espa Roba’s Jinzo not only slaughters all of Joey’s monsters, but it grows in power every turn! Joey’s luck has come to an end… or has it?

programme.title: The Master of Magicians, Part 1
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world’s most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm! Yugi must win this duel or hell lose much more than his Dark Magician!

programme.title: The Master of Magicians, Part 2
programme.desc: It’s Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck! Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up, as long as he believes in the heart of the cards!

programme.title: The Master of Magicians, Part 3
programme.desc: To counter Arkana’s Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: Dark Magician Girl! It’s the battle of the sexes to determine the true master of magicians!

programme.title: Playing With a Parasite, Part 1
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel! Weevil secretly infests Joey’s deck with a parasite that prevents Joey from summoning strong monsters! Without the support of his most powerful beasts, what chance does Joey have against a monster that even Yugi didn’t dare face at Duelist Kingdom: Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth!?

programme.title: Playing With a Parasite, Part 2
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes! Will Weevil’s royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Mime Control, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik’s nefarious Rare Hunters – the silent but deadly Strings! Strings stops all of Yugi’s attacks with Revival Jam, a slippery slime that resurrects whenever it’s destroyed! How can Yugi win if he can’t even put a dent in Strings’s life points?

programme.title: Mime Control, Part 2
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters... the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon! What chance does Yugi’s band of mortal monsters have against an Egyptian God?

programme.title: Mime Control, Part 3
programme.desc: The spell Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand, so Strings’s Slifer the Sky Dragon can grow to infinite attack power! Can Yugi discover Slifer’s one fatal flaw before he’s annihilated by tens of thousands of attack points?

programme.title: Legendary Fisherman, Part 1
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts! If Joey wins, he’ll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye! However, little does Joey realize that he has bigger problems than this duel; the Rare Hunters are closing in on his location…

programme.title: Legendary Fisherman, Part 2
programme.desc: Mako’s oceanic warrior The Legendary Fisherman unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey’s monsters from the depths of the sea! Joey has to put his skills, training and experience to the ultimate test before he’s all washed out!

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 1: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Abductions abound! Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea! To make matters worse, the Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper! The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 2: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba’s tumultuous teamwork! Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they’re sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 3: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it’s too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius, a monstrous menace even more powerful than Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 4: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior! However, little does Yugi know that Umbra and Lumis have one final mask to turn Yugi’s monsters against him…

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends! But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they’ve faced… and will be facing in the future!

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s friend vs. friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi! The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes! Can Yugi break Joey out of his spell, or will Joey break Yugi?

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi’s life points, Yugi can’t bring himself to attack his dear friend! Yugi summons Joey’s favorite monster Red-Eyes B. Dragon to try to bring Joey back to his senses. Will seeing his favorite card help Joey break Marik’s spell, or is Yugi’s last ditch effort a lost cause?

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik’s spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle! When Joey draws the card he needs to decimate Yugi’s life points, what chance does Yugi have, especially on his own?

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 4
programme.desc: There’s only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea! Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom? However, there may be a special savior who just regained her eyesight…

programme.title: Shadow of a Duel
programme.desc: It’s the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz’s zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City Finals! But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm…

programme.title: Lights, Camera, Duel
programme.desc: It’s the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage! Will Mai succumb to Jean-Claude’s charm, not to mention his cadre of ninja monsters, or will she send him packing back to Tinseltown?

programme.title: Let the Finals Begin!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City Finals begin! The eight finalists will have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky! Yugi and friends finally meet the other finalists, but none of them are who they appear to be…

programme.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s the first duel of the Battle City Finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring thats possessing Bakura! Yugi quickly dispatches Bakura’s grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard…

programme.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura, Part 2
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns! If that’s not bad enough, Bakura’s Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi’s life points every time Yugi attacks! Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi’s trapped!

programme.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi’s Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster! Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals, or will he surrender to save Bakura’s life but lose the only chance to protect the world from Marik’s evil?

programme.title: A Trios Challenge - Part 1
programme.desc: Kite, Shark and Yuma join forces to take down Dr. Faker! Can this trio work together as a team and put an end to Faker’s fury, or will Faker and his deck prove to be too much of a challenge for these three fearless friends?

programme.title: A Trios Challenge - Part 2
programme.desc: With the fate of Astral World hanging in the balance, Yuma, Kite and Shark set their sights on stopping Dr. Faker, but before our three heroes can make their final move, Dr. Faker reveals the shocking reason behind his diabolical plan!

programme.title: A Trios Challenge - Part 3
programme.desc: When a mysterious being from Barian World appears, Yuma, Kite and Shark must work together and battle like never before if they want to save Hart, Astral World… and themselves!

programme.title: Kites Plight - Part 1
programme.desc: The stage is set for the ultimate battle between Yuma and Kite, but just when Yuma’s about to high five the sky, Kite brings him crashing down to earth with a startling revelation!

programme.title: Kites Plight - Part 2
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Kite and Yuma comes to an exciting conclusion that leaves one of our duelists down for the count! Will Yuma’s dream of pulling out a victory become a reality, or is Kite going to turn this dream into a nightmare?

programme.title: Attack of the Barians - Part 1
programme.desc: The Barian invasion begins! Yuma faces a dangerous new enemy who will go to any extreme to gain possession of Yuma’s Numbers in order to destroy Astral and his home!

programme.title: Attack of the Barians - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma’s battle with a dangerous and powerful soldier of Barian World continues as he strives to keep Astral safe! Can Yuma beat this Barian enemy and his new Chaos Monster, or will Yuma end up losing what is most valuable to him… Astral?

programme.title: Hard Knox
programme.desc: When pro duelist Devon Knox teaches a special class, Yuma gets taken to the school of hard knocks and learns a valuable lesson about the Barians he won’t soon forget!

programme.title: Rule Duel
programme.desc: Ray nominates Yuma to run against Caswell for the position of Class Representative, but when the Ray Way takes a turn for the worse, Yuma finds himself facing off against a Student Council President who’s been corrupted by the Barians!

programme.title: The Adventures of Artimus Stanleyus
programme.desc: Shark gets hooked into a battle with the Barians when the President of the Comic Book Appreciation Club challenges him to a duel! Can Shark outdraw the competition, or will his Number and life points be erased?

programme.title: Doom in Bloom
programme.desc: Shark’s sister Rio makes a big splash on her first day at school, but not all the attention she gets is good, especially when she catches the eye of a Barian botanist!

programme.title: Rivals in the Ring
programme.desc: A new Barian threat arrives on the scene looking to take Yuma’s Numbers, but his plan gets tripped up when he falls head over heels for Tori!

programme.title: Rage of the Egyptian Gods
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed! The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released!

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 1
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City Finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion’s strategy that guarantees Joey victory… or is Joey falling into another trap?

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 2
programme.desc: Odion’s Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey’s monsters… and his life points! Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he already too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 3
programme.desc: It’s a feeding frenzy as Odion’s Serket devours Joey’s monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Serket when it ingests Joey’s monsters whenever they’re summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 4
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster The Winged Dragon of Ra and targets it to annihilate the rest of Joey’s life points! However, is Odion able to control the ultimate power of an Egyptian God, or will The Winged Dragon of Ra punish all those unworthy of summoning it?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 1
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City Finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it’s a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing life points equals losing your memories! As Marik’s true sinister self comes to the surface, does Mai stand a chance against this malevolent evil?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 2
programme.desc: As Mai loses more and more of her memories under Marik’s relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends’ neverending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 3
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik’s The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she’s unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities! Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself and incinerates Mai with the full fury of The Winged Dragon of Ra?

programme.title: A Duel With Destiny: Kaiba Vs. Ishizu, Part 1
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City Finals, Kaiba’s mystery opponent is… Ishizu! With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play! Does Kaiba stand a chance against an opponent who knows his moves even before he does?

programme.title: A Duel With Destiny: Kaiba Vs. Ishizu, Part 2
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel – she will defeat Kaiba with her trap! How can Kaiba win when it’s already destined that he will lose? It’s time for Kaiba to change the future!

programme.title: The Tomb-Keepers Secret
programme.desc: As Marik’s evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Showdown in the Shadows: Marik Vs. Bakura, Part 1
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and the Millennium Ring, and the loser will be trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever! To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally in the form of… another Marik?

programme.title: Showdown in the Shadows: Marik Vs. Bakura, Part 2
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm! But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all!

programme.title: A Virtual Nightmare !
programme.desc: As Kaiba’s blimp speeds towards KaibaCorp Island for the final rounds of the Battle City Tournament, the ship is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen – five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba’s past who are out for revenge! With the power of cyberspace on Noah’s side, Yugi and friends are trapped inside a new and dangerous Duel Monsters game!

programme.title: Isolated in Cyber Space — Part 1
programme.desc: Noah displays the power of his virtual world by splitting up Yugi’s gang and flinging them into the far reaches of his self-created universe! The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley’s Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Isolated in Cyber Space — Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against Gansley, in the form of "Deepsea Warrior", but struggles with the complexities of the dueling field and the new rules. Tea faces peril from a vicious tribe of cyclopses while Kaiba and Mokuba are brought to a setting similar to their old orphanage.

programme.title: Isolated in Cyber Space — Part 3
programme.desc: Yugis strategy is hindered by Gansleys Deck Master ability. Tristan and Duke face a mean dinosaur to save Serenity. Meanwhile, Kaiba and Mokuba confront painful visions of their miserable childhood, but within the heartache may lurk the key to Noahs true intentions.

programme.title: Freeze Play — Part 1
programme.desc: Tea is led by a penguin to Crump, in the form of Nightmare Penguin, who challenges her to a duel. She learns immediately that dueling in the virtual realm differs starkly from her previous duels, and starts to succumb to the virtual playing field.

programme.title: Freeze Play — Part 2
programme.desc: Despite gaining a lead with Maha Vailo, Tea falls behind as Crump begins an assault on her life points, causing the ice around her to grow. With the help of her Deck Master, Dark Magician Girl, and Yugis Dark Magician, Tea gains enough confidence to win.

programme.title: Courtroom Chaos — Part 1
programme.desc: Joey faces the Big 5s lawyer, Johnson, in a courtroom duel. Joey pulls an early lead with his Deck Master, Flame Swordsman, but Johnsons Deck Master, Judge Man, has abilities of his own.

programme.title: Courtroom Chaos — Part 2
programme.desc: Joey attempts to pull through with several luck-based cards, but Johnsons cheating tactics ruin all his chances, until an angry Noah puts a stop to him.

programme.title: Mechanical Mayhem — Part 1
programme.desc: Tristan, Duke and Serenity duel Nesbitt, the Big 5s mechanical expert. Serenitys lack of experience with the game and Nesbits powerful machine monsters create a tragic end for Tristan.

programme.title: Mechanical Mayhem — Part 2
programme.desc: With Tristan gone and Serenity in shock, Duke attempts to defeat Nesbitt by himself. But when Orgoth the Relentless is destroyed by his Perfect Machine King, Duke tries to help Serenity regain confidence in her abilities. The two later remember Tristans face down card, hoping it will help them win.

programme.title: Settling the Score — Part 1
programme.desc: As Nesbitt (in Tristans body) kidnaps Mokuba, Kaiba is forced to duel Lector, the former assistant to his stepfather. For Lector, the duel is personal, as he plans to take what he believes is rightfully his—KaibaCorp. Meanwhile, Tristan rejoins the group; his friends do not recognize him, since his mind has been downloaded into a mechanical monkey.

programme.title: Settling the Score — Part 2
programme.desc: With Lectors Jinzo Deck Master destroying all of Kaibas traps, Imperial Order destroying all his spell cards, and Lectors unreachable Satellite Cannon striking from space, Kaiba doesnt seem to stand a chance. Mokubas unwavering faith in Kaiba keeps him believing that his brother will pull out with a victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood.

programme.title: Noahs Secret
programme.desc: Yugi, Kaiba, and Tea are separated from the others as the Big 5 (minus Nesbitt) plan to take their bodies anyway. As Noah tortures Kaiba by brainwashing Mokuba, he reveals his true identity as Gozaboro Kaibas biological son.

programme.title: Merger of the Big Five — Part 1
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five, who are using Tristans body.

programme.title: Merger of the Big Five — Part 2
programme.desc: The Big 5 attempt various strategies of victory, with the aim of eliminating Joey first. However, their poor teamwork soon puts Yugi and Joey ahead. Lector then calls their most powerful monster to the field, the Five Head Dragon.

programme.title: Merger of the Big Five — Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey are forced to use their strongest monsters to take down the Five-Headed Dragon.

programme.title: Brothers in Arms — Part 1
programme.desc: Kaiba and Noah duel for full control of KaibaCorp, but Noahs revelations and constant manipulation of the playing field complicate things for Kaiba.

programme.title: Brothers in Arms — Part 2
programme.desc: Noahs Shinatos Ark puts Kaiba in a difficult position, as he scrambles to find a winning strategy.

programme.title: Brothers in Arms — Part 3
programme.desc: Kaiba regains control of the duel, but Noah brings a brainwashed Mokuba out to hinder his plans. After finally breaking through to Mokuba, Kaiba tries to embrace his brother before Noah, jealous over their close relationship, turns them to stone.

programme.title: Noahs Final Threat — Part 1
programme.desc: Enraged at Noahs cruel games, Yugi takes over for Kaiba and duels Noah with only 400 life points.

programme.title: Noahs Final Threat — Part 2
programme.desc: Yugis efforts to win the duel are further complicated by Noah, who turns all of his friends into stone statues, leaving Yugi feeling alone and without hope.

programme.title: So Close Yet So Far
programme.desc: Gozaboro Kaiba reveals himself and plans to virtualize the entire world to create a digital kingdom. With Noahs unlikely aid, Yugi and the others must escape while fending off memories from the past.

programme.title: Burying the Past — Part 1
programme.desc: Using Mokubas body, Noah escapes and sets the virtual world to self-destruct. But Mokubas kindness breaks through his heart, and he tries to set the others free. Meanwhile, Kaiba duels Gozaboro, who summons a seemingly unstoppable monster—Exodia Necross.

programme.title: Burying the Past — Part 2
programme.desc: ami Marik destroys the computers in the control room, disabling the controls for the self-destruct mechanism, which turns the situation desperate. Meanwhile, Kaiba defeats Gozoboro Kaiba, and he and Yugi rush to the exit before the virtual world explodes. Noah erases Gozoboros files and releases his mind, and finally makes peace with his family, and prepares for the destruction of the virtual world.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E336 Undercover Love S1 E336
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E90 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E90
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E336 King of Hearts S1 E336
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E336 Second Chances S1 E336
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E28 Jodha Akbar S4 E28
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E336 This is Fate S1 E336
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E29 Jodha Akbar S4 E29
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.
